52int LuaUnit::GetDisplay(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
53{
54 if (ptr == nullptr)
55 lua_pushinteger(L, 0);
56 else
57 lua_pushinteger(L, ptr->getDisplayId());
58
59 return 1;
60}
61
62int LuaUnit::GetNativeDisplay(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
63{
64 if (ptr == nullptr)
65 lua_pushinteger(L, 0);
66 else
67 lua_pushinteger(L, ptr->getNativeDisplayId());
68
69 return 1;
70}
71
72int LuaUnit::GossipCreateMenu(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
73{
74 const int text_id = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
75 Player* plr = CHECK_PLAYER(L, 2);
76 const int autosend = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 3));
77
78 if (plr == nullptr)
79 return 0;
80
81 if (LuaGlobal::instance()->m_menu != nullptr)
82 delete LuaGlobal::instance()->m_menu;
83
84 LuaGlobal::instance()->m_menu = new GossipMenu(ptr->getGuid(), text_id);
85
86 if (autosend != 0)
87 LuaGlobal::instance()->m_menu->sendGossipPacket(plr);
88
89 return 0;
90}
91
92int LuaUnit::GossipMenuAddItem(lua_State* L, Unit* /*ptr*/)
93{
94 const uint8_t icon = static_cast<uint8_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
95 const char* menu_text = luaL_checkstring(L, 2);
96 const int IntId = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 3));
97 const bool coded = (luaL_checkinteger(L, 4) ? true : false);
98 const char* boxmessage = luaL_optstring(L, 5, "");
99 const uint32_t boxmoney = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_optinteger(L, 6, 0));
100
101 if (LuaGlobal::instance()->m_menu == nullptr)
102 {
103 DLLLogDetail("There is no menu to add items to!");
104 return 0;
105 }
106
107 LuaGlobal::instance()->m_menu->addItem(icon, 0, IntId, menu_text, boxmoney, boxmessage, coded);
108
109 return 0;
110}
111
112int LuaUnit::GossipSendMenu(lua_State* L, Unit* /*ptr*/)
113{
114 Player* plr = CHECK_PLAYER(L, 1);
115
116 if (LuaGlobal::instance()->m_menu == nullptr)
117 {
118 DLLLogDetail("There is no menu to send!");
119 return 0;
120 }
121
122 if (plr != nullptr)
123 LuaGlobal::instance()->m_menu->sendGossipPacket(plr);
124
125 return 0;
126}
127
128int LuaUnit::GossipSendPOI(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
129{
130 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
131 return 0;
132
133 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
134 const float x = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 1);
135 const float y = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 2);
136 const int icon = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 3));
137 const int flags = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 4));
138 const int data = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 5));
139 const char* name = luaL_checkstring(L, 6);
140
141 plr->sendGossipPoiPacket(x, y, icon, flags, data, name);
142
143 return 0;
144}
145
146int LuaUnit::GossipSendQuickMenu(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
147{
148 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
149 return 0;
150
151 const uint32_t text_id = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
152 Player* player = CHECK_PLAYER(L, 2);
153 const uint32_t itemid = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 3));
154 const uint8_t itemicon = CHECK_UINT8(L, 4);
155 const char* itemtext = luaL_checkstring(L, 5);
156 const uint32_t requiredmoney = CHECK_ULONG(L, 6);
157 const char* moneytext = luaL_checkstring(L, 7);
158 const uint8_t extra = CHECK_UINT8(L, 8);
159
160 if (player == nullptr)
161 return 0;
162
163 GossipMenu::sendQuickMenu(ptr->getGuid(), text_id, player, itemid, itemicon, itemtext, requiredmoney, moneytext, extra);
164
165 return 0;
166}
167
168int LuaUnit::GossipAddQuests(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
169{
170 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
171 return 0;
172
173 if (LuaGlobal::instance()->m_menu == nullptr)
174 {
175 DLLLogDetail("There's no menu to fill quests into.");
176 return 0;
177 }
178
179 Player* player = CHECK_PLAYER(L, 1);
180 sQuestMgr.FillQuestMenu(dynamic_cast<Creature*>(ptr), player, *LuaGlobal::instance()->m_menu);
181 return 0;
182}
183
184int LuaUnit::GossipComplete(lua_State* /*L*/, Unit* ptr)
185{
186 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
187 return 0;
188
189 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
190 if (LuaGlobal::instance()->m_menu == nullptr)
191 {
192 DLLLogDetail("There is no menu to complete!");
193 return 0;
194 }
195
196 LuaGlobal::instance()->m_menu->senGossipComplete(plr);
197
198 return 0;
199}
200
201int LuaUnit::IsPlayer(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
202{
203 if (!ptr)
204 {
205 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
206 return 1;
207 }
208
209 if (ptr->isPlayer())
210 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
211 else
212 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
213
214 return 1;
215}
216
217int LuaUnit::IsCreature(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
218{
219 if (!ptr)
220 {
221 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
222 return 1;
223 }
224
225 if (ptr->isCreature())
226 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
227 else
228 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
229
230 return 1;
231}
232
233int LuaUnit::Emote(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
234{
235 if (ptr == nullptr)
236 return 0;
237
238 uint32_t emote_id = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
239 const uint32_t time = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
240 if (emote_id == 0)
241 return 0;
242
243 if (time > 0)
244 ptr->eventAddEmote((EmoteType)emote_id, time);
245 else
246 ptr->emote((EmoteType)emote_id);
247
248 return 1;
249}
250
251int LuaUnit::GetName(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
252{
253 if (!ptr)
254 return 0;
255
256 switch (ptr->getObjectTypeId())
257 {
258 case TYPEID_UNIT:
259 lua_pushstring(L, dynamic_cast<Creature*>(ptr)->GetCreatureProperties() ? dynamic_cast<Creature*>(ptr)->GetCreatureProperties()->Name.c_str() : "Unknown");
260 break;
261
262 case TYPEID_PLAYER:
263 lua_pushstring(L, dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->getName().c_str());
264 break;
265
266 default:
267 lua_pushstring(L, "Unknown");
268 break;
269 }
270
271 return 1;
272}
273
274int LuaUnit::PhaseSet(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
275{
276 const uint32_t newphase = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
277 const bool Save = (luaL_optinteger(L, 2, false) > 0 ? true : false);
278 Creature* crt = nullptr;
279 Player* p_target = nullptr;
280 //Save is only for creatures. if you want to save to DB with players, use your own query (security purposes).
281 //Lua: CharDBQuery("UPDATE `characters` SET `phase`='"..phase.."' WHERE (`name`='"..player:GetName().."'",0)
282 if (!ptr)
283 return 0;
284
285 switch (ptr->getObjectTypeId())
286 {
287 case TYPEID_UNIT:
288 crt = dynamic_cast<Creature*>(ptr);
289 crt->setPhase(PHASE_SET, newphase);
290 if (crt->m_spawn)
291 crt->m_spawn->phase = newphase;
292 if (Save)
293 {
294 crt->SaveToDB();
295 crt->m_loadedFromDB = true;
296 }
297 break;
298
299 case TYPEID_PLAYER:
300 p_target = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
301 p_target->setPhase(PHASE_SET, newphase);
302 break;
303
304 default:
305 break;
306 }
307 return 0;
308}
309
310int LuaUnit::PhaseAdd(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
311{
312 const uint32_t newphase = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
313 const bool Save = (luaL_optinteger(L, 2, false) > 0 ? true : false);
314 Creature* crt = nullptr;
315 Player* p_target = nullptr;
316 //Save is only for creatures. if you want to save to DB with players, use your own query (security purposes).
317 //Lua: CharDBQuery("UPDATE `characters` SET `phase`='"..player:GetPhase().."' WHERE (`name`='"..player:GetName().."'",0)
318 if (!ptr)
319 return 0;
320
321 switch (ptr->getObjectTypeId())
322 {
323 case TYPEID_UNIT:
324 crt = dynamic_cast<Creature*>(ptr);
325 crt->setPhase(PHASE_ADD, newphase);
326 if (crt->m_spawn)
327 crt->m_spawn->phase |= newphase;
328
329 if (Save)
330 {
331 crt->SaveToDB();
332 crt->m_loadedFromDB = true;
333 }
334 break;
335
336 case TYPEID_PLAYER:
337 p_target = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
338 p_target->setPhase(PHASE_ADD, newphase);
339 break;
340
341 default:
342 break;
343 }
344 return 0;
345}
346
347int LuaUnit::PhaseDelete(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
348{
349 const uint32_t newphase = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
350 const bool Save = (luaL_checkinteger(L, 2) > 0 ? true : false);
351 Creature* crt = nullptr;
352 Player* p_target = nullptr;
353 //Save is only for creatures. if you want to save to DB with players, use your own query (security purposes).
354 //Lua: CharDBQuery("UPDATE `characters` SET `phase`='"..player:GetPhase().."' WHERE (`name`='"..player:GetName().."'",0)
355 if (!ptr)
356 return 0;
357
358 switch (ptr->getObjectTypeId())
359 {
360 case TYPEID_UNIT:
361 crt = dynamic_cast<Creature*>(ptr);
362 crt->setPhase(PHASE_DEL, newphase);
363 if (crt->m_spawn)
364 crt->m_spawn->phase &= ~newphase;
365
366 if (Save)
367 {
368 crt->SaveToDB();
369 crt->m_loadedFromDB = true;
370 }
371 break;
372
373 case TYPEID_PLAYER:
374 p_target = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
375 p_target->setPhase(PHASE_DEL, newphase);
376 break;
377
378 default:
379 break;
380 }
381 return 0;
382}
383
384int LuaUnit::GetPhase(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
385{
386 if (!ptr)
387 return 0;
388 lua_pushnumber(L, ptr->m_phase);
389 return 1;
390}
391
392int LuaUnit::SendChatMessage(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
393{
394 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
395 return 0;
396
397 const uint8_t typ = static_cast<uint8_t>(CHECK_ULONG(L, 1));
398 const uint32_t lang = CHECK_ULONG(L, 2);
399 const char* message = luaL_checklstring(L, 3, nullptr);
400 if (message == nullptr)
401 return 0;
402
403 ptr->sendChatMessage(typ, lang, message);
404 return 0;
405}
406
407int LuaUnit::PlayerSendChatMessage(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
408{
409 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
410 return 0;
411
412 const uint8_t type = CHECK_UINT8(L, 1);
413 const uint32_t lang = CHECK_ULONG(L, 2);
414 const char* msg = luaL_checklstring(L, 3, nullptr);
415 const Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
416 if (msg == nullptr)
417 return 0;
418
419 plr->getSession()->SendChatPacket(AscEmu::Packets::SmsgMessageChat(type, lang, 0, msg, plr->getGuid()).serialise().get(), 1, lang, plr->getSession());
420 for (const auto& itr : plr->getInRangePlayersSet())
421 {
422 if (itr)
423 dynamic_cast<Player*>(itr)->getSession()->SendChatPacket(AscEmu::Packets::SmsgMessageChat(type, lang, 0, msg, plr->getGuid()).serialise().get(), 1, lang, plr->getSession());
424 }
425 return 0;
426}
427
428int LuaUnit::AggroWithInRangeFriends(lua_State* /*L*/, Unit* ptr)
429{
430 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
431 return 0;
432
433 // If Pointer isn't in combat skip everything
434 if (!ptr->getCombatHandler().isInCombat())
435 return 0;
436
437 Unit* pTarget = ptr->getAIInterface()->getCurrentTarget();
438 if (!pTarget)
439 return 0;
440
441 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangeObjectsSet())
442 {
443 if (!itr)
444 continue;
445
446 Object* obj = itr;
447 // Object Isn't a Unit, Unit is Dead
448 if (!obj->isCreatureOrPlayer() || dynamic_cast<Unit*>(obj)->isDead())
449 continue;
450
451 if (!obj->isFriendlyTo(ptr))
452 continue;
453
454 if (ptr->GetDistance2dSq(obj) > 10 * 10) // 10yrd range?
455 continue;
456
457 const Unit* pUnit = dynamic_cast<Unit*>(obj);
458
459 pUnit->getAIInterface()->setCurrentTarget(pTarget);
460 pUnit->getAIInterface()->onHostileAction(pTarget);
461 }
462 return 0;
463}
464
465int LuaUnit::MoveTo(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
466{
467 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
468 return 0;
469
470 const float x = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 1);
471 const float y = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 2);
472 const float z = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 3);
473 //float o = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 4);
474
475 ptr->getAIInterface()->moveTo(x, y, z);
476 return 0;
477}
478
479int LuaUnit::MoveRandomArea(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
480{
481 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
482 return 0;
483
484 const float x1 = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 1);
485 const float y1 = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 2);
486 const float z1 = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 3);
487 const float x2 = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 4);
488 const float y2 = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 5);
489 const float z2 = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 6);
490 //float o2 = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 7);
491
492 ptr->getAIInterface()->moveTo(x1 + (Util::getRandomFloat(x2 - x1)), y1 + (Util::getRandomFloat(y2 - y1)), z1 + (Util::getRandomFloat(z2 - z1)));
493 return 0;
494}
495
496int LuaUnit::GetX(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
497{
498 if (ptr != nullptr)
499 lua_pushnumber(L, ptr->GetPositionX());
500 else
501 lua_pushnil(L);
502 return 1;
503}
504
505int LuaUnit::GetY(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
506{
507 if (ptr != nullptr)
508 lua_pushnumber(L, ptr->GetPositionY());
509 else
510 lua_pushnil(L);
511 return 1;
512}

514int LuaUnit::GetZ(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
515{
516 if (ptr != nullptr)
517 lua_pushnumber(L, ptr->GetPositionZ());
518 else
519 lua_pushnil(L);
520 return 1;
521}

523int LuaUnit::GetO(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
524{
525 if (ptr != nullptr)
526 lua_pushnumber(L, ptr->GetOrientation());
527 else
528 lua_pushnil(L);
529 return 1;
530}
531
532int LuaUnit::CastSpell(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
533{
534 const uint32_t sp = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
535 if (sp && ptr)
536 ptr->castSpell(ptr, sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(sp), true);
537 return 0;
538}
539
540int LuaUnit::FullCastSpell(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
541{
542 const uint32_t sp = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
543 if (sp && ptr)
544 ptr->castSpell(ptr, sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(sp), false);
545 return 0;
546}
547
548int LuaUnit::FullCastSpellOnTarget(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
549{
550 if (ptr != nullptr)
551 {
552 const uint32_t sp = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
553 const Object* target = CHECK_OBJECT(L, 2);
554 if (sp && target != nullptr)
555 ptr->castSpell(target->getGuid(), sp, false);
556 }
557 return 0;
558}
559
560int LuaUnit::CastSpellOnTarget(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
561{
562 const uint32_t sp = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
563 const Object* target = CHECK_OBJECT(L, 2);
564 if (ptr != nullptr && sp && target != nullptr)
565 ptr->castSpell(target->getGuid(), sp, true);
566 return 0;
567}
568
569int LuaUnit::SpawnCreature(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
570{
571 if (ptr == nullptr)
572 return 0;
573
574 const uint32_t entry = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
575 const float x = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 2);
576 const float y = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 3);
577 const float z = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 4);
578 const float o = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 5);
579 const uint32_t faction = CHECK_ULONG(L, 6);
580 const uint32_t duration = CHECK_ULONG(L, 7);
581 const uint32_t equip1 = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_optinteger(L, 8, 1));
582 const uint32_t equip2 = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_optinteger(L, 9, 1));
583 const uint32_t equip3 = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_optinteger(L, 10, 1));
584 const uint32_t phase = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_optinteger(L, 11, ptr->m_phase));
585 const bool save = (luaL_optinteger(L, 12, 0) ? true : false);
586
587 if (!entry)
588 {
589 lua_pushnil(L);
590 return 1;
591 }
592 CreatureProperties const* p = sMySQLStore.getCreatureProperties(entry);
593 if (p == nullptr)
594 {
595 lua_pushnil(L);
596 return 1;
597 }
598 Creature* pCreature = ptr->getWorldMap()->createCreature(entry);
599 if (pCreature == nullptr)
600 {
601 lua_pushnil(L);
602 return 1;
603 }
604 pCreature->Load(p, x, y, z, o);
605 pCreature->setFaction(faction);
606 pCreature->setVirtualItemSlotId(MELEE, equip1);
607 pCreature->setVirtualItemSlotId(OFFHAND, equip2);
608 pCreature->setVirtualItemSlotId(RANGED, equip3);
609 pCreature->setPhase(PHASE_SET, phase);
610 pCreature->m_noRespawn = true;
611 pCreature->AddToWorld(ptr->getWorldMap());
612 if (duration)
613 pCreature->Despawn(duration, 0);
614 if (save)
615 pCreature->SaveToDB();
616 PUSH_UNIT(L, pCreature);
617 return 1;
618}
619
620int LuaUnit::SpawnGameObject(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
621{
622 if (ptr == nullptr)
623 return 0;
624 const uint32_t entry_id = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
625 const float x = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 2);
626 const float y = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 3);
627 const float z = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 4);
628 const float o = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 5);
629 const uint32_t duration = CHECK_ULONG(L, 6);
630 const float scale = (float)(luaL_optinteger(L, 7, 100) / 100.0f);
631 const uint32_t phase = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_optinteger(L, 8, ptr->m_phase));
632 const bool save = luaL_optinteger(L, 9, 0) ? true : false;
633 if (entry_id)
634 {
635 GameObjectProperties const* info = sMySQLStore.getGameObjectProperties(entry_id);
636 if (info == nullptr)
637 {
638 DLLLogDetail("Lua script tried to spawn a gameobject that doesn't exist ( %u ). Aborting.", entry_id);
639 lua_pushnil(L);
640 return 1;
641 }
642
643 GameObject* go = ptr->getWorldMap()->createGameObject(entry_id);
644 go->create(entry_id, ptr->getWorldMap(), ptr->GetPhase(), LocationVector(x, y, z, o), QuaternionData(), GO_STATE_CLOSED);
645 go->Phase(PHASE_SET, phase);
646 go->setScale(scale);
647 go->AddToWorld(ptr->getWorldMap());
648
649 if (duration)
650 go->despawn(duration, 0);
651 if (save)
652 go->saveToDB();
653 PUSH_GO(L, go);
654 }
655 else
656 lua_pushnil(L);
657 return 1;
658}
659int LuaUnit::RegisterEvent(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
660{
661 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
662 return 0;
663
664 const char* typeName = luaL_typename(L, 1);
665 const int delay = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
666 const int repeats = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 3));
667 if (!delay)
668 return 0;
669 lua_settop(L, 1);
670 int functionRef = 0;
671 if (!strcmp(typeName, "function"))
672 functionRef = luaL_ref(L, LUA_REGISTRYINDEX);
673 else if (!strcmp(typeName, "string"))
674 functionRef = LuaHelpers::ExtractfRefFromCString(L, luaL_checkstring(L, 1));
675
676 if (functionRef)
677 {
678 Creature* creature = dynamic_cast<Creature*>(ptr);
679 sEventMgr.AddEvent(creature, &Creature::TriggerScriptEvent, functionRef, EVENT_LUA_CREATURE_EVENTS, delay, repeats, EVENT_FLAG_DO_NOT_EXECUTE_IN_WORLD_CONTEXT);
680 std::map< uint64_t, std::set<int> >& objRefs = LuaGlobal::instance()->luaEngine()->getObjectFunctionRefs();
681 const std::map< uint64_t, std::set<int> >::iterator itr = objRefs.find(ptr->getGuid());
682 if (itr == objRefs.end())
683 {
684 std::set<int> refs;
685 refs.insert(functionRef);
686 objRefs.insert(make_pair(ptr->getGuid(), refs));
687 }
688 else
689 {
690 std::set<int>& refs = itr->second;
691 refs.insert(functionRef);
692 }
693 }
694 return 0;
695}
696/* This one just simply calls the function directly w/o any arguments,
697the trick to arguments is done Lua side through closures(function that
698calls the wanted function with the wanted arguments */
699int LuaUnit::CreateLuaEvent(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
700{
701 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
702 {
703 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
704 return 1;
705 }
706
707 const char* typeName = luaL_typename(L, 1);
708 const int delay = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
709 const int repeats = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 3));
710 if (!delay)
711 return 0;
712
713 lua_settop(L, 1);
714 int functionRef = 0;
715 if (!strcmp(typeName, "function"))
716 functionRef = luaL_ref(L, LUA_REGISTRYINDEX);
717 else if (!strcmp(typeName, "string"))
718 functionRef = LuaHelpers::ExtractfRefFromCString(L, luaL_checkstring(L, 1));
719
720 if (functionRef)
721 {
722 auto ev = TimedEvent::Allocate(ptr, std::make_unique<CallbackP1<LuaEngine, int>>(LuaGlobal::instance()->luaEngine().get(), &LuaEngine::CallFunctionByReference, functionRef), EVENT_LUA_CREATURE_EVENTS, delay, repeats);
723 ptr->event_AddEvent(std::move(ev));
724 std::map< uint64_t, std::set<int> >& objRefs = LuaGlobal::instance()->luaEngine()->getObjectFunctionRefs();
725 const std::map< uint64_t, std::set<int> >::iterator itr = objRefs.find(ptr->getGuid());
726 if (itr == objRefs.end())
727 {
728 std::set<int> refs;
729 refs.insert(functionRef);
730 objRefs.insert(make_pair(ptr->getGuid(), refs));
731 }
732 else
733 {
734 std::set<int>& refs = itr->second;
735 refs.insert(functionRef);
736 }
737 }
738 return 0;
739}
740
741int LuaUnit::RemoveEvents(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
742{
743 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
744 return 0;
745
746 sEventMgr.RemoveEvents(ptr, EVENT_LUA_CREATURE_EVENTS);
747 //Unref all contained references
748 std::map< uint64_t, std::set<int> >& objRefs = LuaGlobal::instance()->luaEngine()->getObjectFunctionRefs();
749 const std::map< uint64_t, std::set<int> >::iterator itr = objRefs.find(ptr->getGuid());
750 if (itr != objRefs.end())
751 {
752 std::set<int>& refs = itr->second;
753 for (std::set<int>::iterator it = refs.begin(); it != refs.end(); ++it)
754 luaL_unref(L, LUA_REGISTRYINDEX, (*it));
755 refs.clear();
756 }
757 return 0;
758}
759
760int LuaUnit::SetFaction(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
761{
762 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
763 {
764 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
765 return 1;
766 }
767
768 const int faction = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
769 if (!faction)
770 return 0;
771
772 ptr->setFaction(faction);
773 return 0;
774}
775
776int LuaUnit::GetNativeFaction(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
777{
778 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
779 {
780 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
781 return 1;
782 }
783
784 if (ptr->isPlayer())
785 RET_INT(dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->getInitialFactionId());
786
787 if (dynamic_cast<Creature*>(ptr)->GetCreatureProperties())
788 RET_INT(dynamic_cast<Creature*>(ptr)->GetCreatureProperties()->Faction);
789
790 RET_INT(ptr->getFactionTemplate());
791}
792
793int LuaUnit::SetStandState(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr) //states 0..8
794{
795 if (!ptr)
796 return 0;
797
798 const uint8_t state = static_cast<uint8_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
799
800 ptr->setStandState(state);
801 return 0;
802}
803
804int LuaUnit::IsInCombat(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
805{
806 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld())
807 {
808 lua_pushnil(L);
809 return 1;
810 }
811
812 if (ptr->getCombatHandler().isInCombat())
813 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
814 else
815 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
816
817 return 1;
818}
819
820int LuaUnit::SetScale(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
821{
822 const float scale = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 1);
823 if (scale && ptr)
824 ptr->setScale(scale);
825 else
826 RET_BOOL(false)
827
828 RET_BOOL(true)
829}

831int LuaUnit::SetModel(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
832{
833 const uint32_t model = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
834 if (ptr != nullptr)
835 ptr->setDisplayId(model);
836 else
837 RET_BOOL(false)
838
839 RET_BOOL(true)
840}

842int LuaUnit::ResetModel(lua_State* /*L*/, Unit* ptr)
843{
844 if (ptr != nullptr)
845 ptr->resetDisplayId();
846
847 return 0;
848}

870int LuaUnit::RemoveItem(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
871{
872 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
873 return 0;
874
875 const uint32_t id = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
876 const uint32_t count = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
877
878 dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->getItemInterface()->RemoveItemAmt(id, count);
879 return 0;
880}
881
882int LuaUnit::AddItem(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
883{
884 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
885 return 0;
886
887 const uint32_t id = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
888 const uint32_t count = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
889
890 const auto player = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
891 ItemProperties const* item_proto = sMySQLStore.getItemProperties(id);
892 if (item_proto == nullptr)
893 return 0;
894
895 player->getItemInterface()->AddItemById(id, count, 0);
896 // TODO
897 //PUSH_ITEM(L, item_add);
898 return 1;
899}
900
901int LuaUnit::GetInstanceID(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
902{
903 //if(ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature()) { return 0; }
904 if (!ptr || ptr->getWorldMap() == nullptr || ptr->getWorldMap()->getBaseMap()->isWorldMap())
905 lua_pushnil(L);
906 else
907 lua_pushinteger(L, ptr->GetInstanceID());
908 return 1;
909}
910
911int LuaUnit::GetClosestPlayer(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
912{
913 if (!ptr)
914 return 0;
915
916 float dist = 0;
917 float d2 = 0;
918 Player* ret = nullptr;
919
920 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangePlayersSet())
921 {
922 d2 = itr->getDistanceSq(ptr);
923 if (!ret || d2 < dist)
924 {
925 dist = d2;
926 ret = dynamic_cast<Player*>(itr);
927 }
928 }
929
930 if (ret == nullptr)
931 lua_pushnil(L);
932 else
933 PUSH_UNIT(L, ret);
934
935 return 1;
936}
937
938int LuaUnit::GetRandomPlayer(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
939{
940 if (ptr == nullptr)
941 return 0;
942
943 const int flag = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
944 Player* ret = nullptr;
945 std::vector<Player*> players;
946 switch (flag)
947 {
948 case RANDOM_ANY:
949 {
950 uint32_t count = static_cast<uint32_t>(ptr->getInRangePlayersCount());
951 const uint32_t r = Util::getRandomUInt(count - 1);
952 count = 0;
953 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangePlayersSet())
954 {
955 if (count == r)
956 {
957 ret = dynamic_cast<Player*>(itr);
958 break;
959 }
960 ++count;
961 }
962 }
963 break;
964 case RANDOM_IN_SHORTRANGE:
965 {
966 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangePlayersSet())
967 {
968 Player* obj = dynamic_cast<Player*>(itr);
969 if (obj && obj->CalcDistance(obj, ptr) <= 8)
970 players.push_back(obj);
971 }
972 if (players.size())
973 ret = players[Util::getRandomUInt(static_cast<uint32_t>(players.size() - 1))];
974 }
975 break;
976 case RANDOM_IN_MIDRANGE:
977 {
978 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangePlayersSet())
979 {
980 Player* obj = dynamic_cast<Player*>(itr);
981 const float distance = obj->CalcDistance(obj, ptr);
982 if (distance < 20 && distance > 8)
983 players.push_back(obj);
984 }
985 if (players.size())
986 ret = players[Util::getRandomUInt(static_cast<uint32_t>(players.size() - 1))];
987 }
988 break;
989 case RANDOM_IN_LONGRANGE:
990 {
991 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangePlayersSet())
992 {
993 Player* obj = dynamic_cast<Player*>(itr);
994 if (obj && obj->CalcDistance(obj, ptr) >= 20)
995 players.push_back(obj);
996 }
997 if (players.size())
998 ret = players[Util::getRandomUInt(static_cast<uint32_t>(players.size() - 1))];
999 }
1000 break;
1001 case RANDOM_WITH_MANA:
1002 {
1003 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangePlayersSet())
1004 {
1005 Player* obj = dynamic_cast<Player*>(itr);
1006 if (obj && obj->getPowerType() == POWER_TYPE_MANA)
1007 players.push_back(obj);
1008 }
1009 if (players.size())
1010 ret = players[Util::getRandomUInt(static_cast<uint32_t>(players.size() - 1))];
1011 }
1012 break;
1013 case RANDOM_WITH_ENERGY:
1014 {
1015 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangePlayersSet())
1016 {
1017 Player* obj = dynamic_cast<Player*>(itr);
1018 if (obj && obj->getPowerType() == POWER_TYPE_ENERGY)
1019 players.push_back(obj);
1020 }
1021 if (players.size())
1022 ret = players[Util::getRandomUInt(static_cast<uint32_t>(players.size() - 1))];
1023 }
1024 break;
1025 case RANDOM_WITH_RAGE:
1026 {
1027 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangePlayersSet())
1028 {
1029 Player* obj = dynamic_cast<Player*>(itr);
1030 if (obj && obj->getPowerType() == POWER_TYPE_RAGE)
1031 players.push_back(obj);
1032 }
1033 if (players.size())
1034 ret = players[Util::getRandomUInt(static_cast<uint32_t>(players.size() - 1))];
1035 }
1036 break;
1037 case RANDOM_NOT_MAINTANK:
1038 {
1039 const Unit* mt = ptr->getAIInterface()->getCurrentTarget();
1040 if (mt == nullptr || !mt->isPlayer())
1041 return 0;
1042
1043 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangePlayersSet())
1044 {
1045 Player* obj = dynamic_cast<Player*>(itr);
1046 if (obj != mt)
1047 players.push_back(obj);
1048 }
1049 if (players.size())
1050 ret = players[Util::getRandomUInt(static_cast<uint32_t>(players.size() - 1))];
1051 }
1052 break;
1053 }
1054
1055 if (ret == nullptr)
1056 lua_pushnil(L);
1057 else
1058 PUSH_UNIT(L, ret);
1059
1060 return 1;
1061}
1062
1063int LuaUnit::GetRandomFriend(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1064{
1065 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
1066 return 0;
1067
1068 std::vector<Object*> allies;
1069
1070 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangeObjectsSet())
1071 {
1072 Object* obj = itr;
1073 if (obj && obj->isCreatureOrPlayer() && obj->isFriendlyTo(ptr))
1074 allies.push_back(obj);
1075 }
1076
1077 if (allies.size())
1078 PUSH_UNIT(L, allies[Util::getRandomUInt(static_cast<uint32_t>(allies.size() - 1))]);
1079 else
1080 lua_pushnil(L);
1081
1082 return 1;
1083}
1084
1085int LuaUnit::GetRandomEnemy(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1086{
1087 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
1088 return 0;
1089
1090 std::vector<Object*> enemies;
1091
1092 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangeObjectsSet())
1093 {
1094 Object* obj = itr;
1095 if (obj && obj->isCreatureOrPlayer() && ptr->isHostileTo(obj))
1096 enemies.push_back(obj);
1097 }
1098
1099 if (enemies.size())
1100 PUSH_UNIT(L, enemies[Util::getRandomUInt(static_cast<uint32_t>(enemies.size() - 1))]);
1101 else
1102 lua_pushnil(L);
1103
1104 return 1;
1105}

1109 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
1110 return 0;
1111
1112 const uint32_t tim = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
1113 ptr->pauseMovement(tim);
1114 return 0;
1115}

1123 ptr->removeAllAurasById(auraid);
1124 return 0;

1127int LuaUnit::CanAttack(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1128{
1129 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
1130 {
1131 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
1132 return 1;
1133 }
1134
1135 Unit* target = CHECK_UNIT(L, 1);
1136 if (!target)
1137 return 0;
1138
1139 if (ptr->isValidTarget(target))
1140 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
1141 else
1142 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
1143
1144 return 1;
1145}

1153 ptr->PlaySoundToSet(soundid);
1154 return 0;

1157int LuaUnit::PlaySoundToPlayer(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1158{
1159 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
1160 return 0;
1161
1162 const uint32_t soundid = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
1163 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
1164 plr->sendPlayObjectSoundPacket(plr->getGuid(), soundid);
1165 return 0;
1166}

1168int LuaUnit::GetUnitBySqlId(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)

1171 if (!ptr || !sqlid)
1172 return 0;

1175 return 1;

1177
1178int LuaUnit::GetInventoryItem(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1179{
1180 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
1181 return 0;
1182
1183 const int8_t containerslot = static_cast<int8_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
1184 const int16_t slot = static_cast<int16_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
1185 const Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
1186 PUSH_ITEM(L, plr->getItemInterface()->GetInventoryItem(containerslot, slot));
1187 return 1;
1188}
1189
1190int LuaUnit::GetInventoryItemById(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1191{
1192 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
1193 return 0;
1194
1195 const uint32_t entry = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
1196 const Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
1197 const int16_t slot = plr->getItemInterface()->GetInventorySlotById(entry);
1198 if (slot == -1) //check bags
1199 {
1200 for (uint8_t contslot = INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_START; contslot != INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END; contslot++)
1201 {
1202 Container* bag = dynamic_cast<Container*>(plr->getItemInterface()->GetInventoryItem(contslot));
1203 if (bag == nullptr)
1204 continue;
1205
1206 for (uint8_t bslot = 0; bslot != bag->getSlotCount(); bslot++)
1207 {
1208 if (bag->getItem(bslot) && bag->getItem(bslot)->getEntry() == entry)
1209 {
1210 PUSH_ITEM(L, bag->getItem(bslot));
1211 return 1;
1212 }
1213 }
1214 }
1215 }
1216 PUSH_ITEM(L, plr->getItemInterface()->GetInventoryItem(slot));
1217 return 1;
1218}
1219
1220int LuaUnit::SetZoneWeather(lua_State* L, Unit* /*ptr*/)
1221{
1222 const uint32_t zoneId = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
1223 const uint32_t type = CHECK_ULONG(L, 2);
1224 const float density = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 3);
1225 if (!zoneId)
1226 return 0;
1227
1228 sWeatherMgr.sendWeatherForZone(type, density, zoneId);
1229 return 0;
1230}
1231
1232int LuaUnit::SetPlayerWeather(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1233{
1234 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
1235 return 0;
1236
1237 const auto player = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
1238 const uint32_t type = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
1239 const float density = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 2);
1240
1241 sWeatherMgr.sendWeatherForPlayer(type, density, player);
1242
1243 return 0;
1244}
1245
1246int LuaUnit::Despawn(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1247{
1248 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
1249 return 0;
1250
1251 const uint32_t delay = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
1252 const uint32_t respawntime = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
1253 dynamic_cast<Creature*>(ptr)->Despawn(delay, respawntime);
1254 return 0;
1255}
1256
1257int LuaUnit::GetInRangeFriends(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1258{
1259 if (ptr == nullptr)
1260 return 0;
1261
1262 uint32_t count = 0;
1263 lua_newtable(L);
1264 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangeObjectsSet())
1265 {
1266 if (itr && itr->isCreatureOrPlayer() && ptr->isFriendlyTo(itr))
1267 {
1268 count++;
1269 lua_pushinteger(L, count);
1270 PUSH_UNIT(L, itr);
1271 lua_rawset(L, -3);
1272 }
1273 }
1274 return 1;
1275}
1276
1277int LuaUnit::GetInRangeEnemies(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1278{
1279 if (ptr == nullptr)
1280 return 0;
1281
1282 uint32_t count = 0;
1283 lua_newtable(L);
1284 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangeObjectsSet())
1285 {
1286 if (itr && itr->isCreatureOrPlayer() && !ptr->isFriendlyTo(itr))
1287 {
1288 count++;
1289 lua_pushinteger(L, count);
1290 PUSH_UNIT(L, itr);
1291 lua_rawset(L, -3);
1292 }
1293 }
1294 return 1;
1295}
1296
1297int LuaUnit::GetInRangeUnits(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1298{
1299 if (ptr == nullptr)
1300 return 0;
1301
1302 uint32_t count = 0;
1303 lua_newtable(L);
1304 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangeObjectsSet())
1305 {
1306 if (itr && itr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
1307 {
1308 ++count;
1309 lua_pushinteger(L, count);
1310 PUSH_UNIT(L, itr);
1311 lua_rawset(L, -3);
1312 }
1313 }
1314 return 1;
1315}
1316

1318{

1320 lua_pushinteger(L, 0);
1321 else
1322 lua_pushinteger(L, ptr->getHealthPct());
1323 return 1;
1324}

1326int LuaUnit::SetHealthPct(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)

1329 if (val && ptr)
1330 ptr->setHealthPct(val);
1331 return 0;
1332}

1338

1340 lua_pushinteger(L, dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->getItemInterface()->GetItemCount(itemid, false));
1341 return 1;

1350 if (!ret)
1351 lua_pushnil(L);
1352 else

1354 return 1;
1355}

1360 return 0;
1361
1362 Unit* ret = ptr->getThreatManager().getSecondMostHated();
1363 if (ret == nullptr)
1364 lua_pushnil(L);
1365 else
1366 PUSH_UNIT(L, ret);
1367 return 1;
1368}

1376 return 0;

1378
1379int LuaUnit::SetTauntedBy(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1380{
1381 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
1382 return 0;
1383
1384 Unit* target = CHECK_UNIT(L, 1);
1385 if (!target || target == ptr)
1386 return 0;
1387
1388 ptr->castSpell(target, 53798, false);
1389 return 0;
1390}
1391
1392int LuaUnit::ModThreat(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1393{
1394 Unit* target = CHECK_UNIT(L, 1);
1395 const auto amount = static_cast<float>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
1396 if (ptr && target && amount)
1397 ptr->getThreatManager().addThreat(target, amount, nullptr, false, true);
1398 return 0;
1399}
1400
1401int LuaUnit::GetThreatByPtr(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1402{
1403 const Unit* target = CHECK_UNIT(L, 1);
1404 if (ptr && target)
1405 lua_pushnumber(L, ptr->getThreatManager().getThreat(target));
1406 return 1;
1407}
1408
1409int LuaUnit::ChangeTarget(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1410{
1411 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
1412 return 0;
1413
1414 Unit* target = CHECK_UNIT(L, 1);
1415 if (!target || !ptr->isHostileTo(target) || ptr == target)
1416 return 0;
1417
1418 ptr->getAIInterface()->setCurrentTarget(target);
1419 return 0;
1420}
1421
1422int LuaUnit::HasFinishedQuest(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1423{
1424 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
1425 {
1426 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
1427 return 1;
1428 }
1429 const uint32_t questid = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
1430 if (dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->hasQuestFinished(questid))
1431 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
1432 else
1433 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
1434 return 1;
1435}
1436
1437int LuaUnit::FinishQuest(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1438{
1439 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
1440 {
1441 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
1442 return 1;
1443 }
1444 const uint32_t quest_id = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
1445 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
1446
1447 if (auto* qst = sMySQLStore.getQuestProperties(quest_id))
1448 {
1449 if (plr->hasQuestFinished(quest_id))
1450 {
1451 lua_pushnumber(L, 0);
1452 return 1;
1453 }
1454
1455 if (auto* questLog = plr->getQuestLogByQuestId(quest_id))
1456 {
1457 sQuestMgr.GenerateQuestXP(plr, qst);
1458 sQuestMgr.BuildQuestComplete(plr, qst);
1459
1460 questLog->finishAndRemove();
1461 plr->addQuestToFinished(quest_id);
1462 plr->updateNearbyQuestGameObjects();
1463 lua_pushnumber(L, 1);
1464 return 1;
1465 }
1466
1467 lua_pushnumber(L, 2);
1468 return 1;
1469 }
1470 return 0;
1471}
1472
1473int LuaUnit::StartQuest(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1474{
1475 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
1476 {
1477 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
1478 return 1;
1479 }
1480 const uint32_t quest_id = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
1481 Player* player = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
1482
1483 if (auto* questProperties = sMySQLStore.getQuestProperties(quest_id))
1484 {
1485 if (player->hasQuestFinished(quest_id))
1486 {
1487 lua_pushnumber(L, 0);
1488 return 1;
1489 }
1490
1491 if (player->hasQuestInQuestLog(quest_id))
1492 {
1493 lua_pushnumber(L, 1);
1494 return 1;
1495 }
1496
1497 const uint8_t open_slot = player->getFreeQuestSlot();
1498 if (open_slot > MAX_QUEST_SLOT)
1499 {
1500 sQuestMgr.SendQuestLogFull(player);
1501 lua_pushnumber(L, 2);
1502 return 1;
1503 }
1504
1505 QuestLogEntry* questLogEntry = new QuestLogEntry(questProperties, player, open_slot);
1506 questLogEntry->updatePlayerFields();
1507 // If the quest should give any items on begin, give them the items.
1508 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
1509 {
1510 if (questProperties->receive_items[i])
1511 {
1512 auto item = sObjectMgr.createItem(questProperties->receive_items[i], player);
1513 if (item == nullptr)
1514 return false;
1515
1516 player->getItemInterface()->AddItemToFreeSlot(std::move(item));
1517 }
1518 }
1519
1520 if (questProperties->srcitem && questProperties->srcitem != questProperties->receive_items[0])
1521 {
1522 auto item = sObjectMgr.createItem(questProperties->srcitem, player);
1523 if (item)
1524 {
1525 item->setStackCount(questProperties->srcitemcount ? questProperties->srcitemcount : 1);
1526 player->getItemInterface()->AddItemToFreeSlot(std::move(item));
1527 }
1528 }
1529
1530 sHookInterface.OnQuestAccept(player, questProperties, nullptr);
1531 lua_pushnumber(L, 3);
1532 return 1;
1533
1534 }
1535 return 0;
1536} // StartQuest
1537
1538int LuaUnit::UnlearnSpell(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1539{
1540 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
1541 return 0;
1542
1543 const uint32_t spellid = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
1544 dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->removeSpell(spellid, false);
1545 return 0;
1546}
1547
1548int LuaUnit::LearnSpell(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1549{
1550 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
1551 return 0;
1552
1553 const uint32_t spellid = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
1554 dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->addSpell(spellid);
1555 return 0;
1556}
1557
1558int LuaUnit::LearnSpells(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1559{
1560 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
1561 {
1562 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
1563 return 1;
1564 }
1565
1566 if (!strcmp("table", luaL_typename(L, 1)))
1567 {
1568 const int table = lua_gettop(L);
1569 lua_pushnil(L);
1570 while (lua_next(L, table) != 0)
1571 {
1572 if (lua_isnumber(L, -1))
1573 dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->addSpell(CHECK_ULONG(L, -1));
1574 lua_pop(L, 1);
1575 }
1576 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
1577 lua_replace(L, table);
1578 lua_settop(L, table); // Paroxysm: The stack should be balanced but just in case.
1579 }
1580 else
1581 {
1582 lua_settop(L, 0);
1583 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
1584 }
1585 return 1;
1586}
1587
1588int LuaUnit::MarkQuestObjectiveAsComplete(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1589{
1590 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
1591 return 0;
1592
1593 const uint32_t questid = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
1594 const uint8_t objective = static_cast<uint8_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
1595 Player* player = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
1596
1597 if (!player->hasQuestFinished(questid))
1598 {
1599 if (const auto questLog = player->getQuestLogByQuestId(questid))
1600 {
1601 questLog->setMobCountForIndex(objective, questLog->getQuestProperties()->required_mob_or_go[objective]);
1602 questLog->sendUpdateAddKill(objective);
1603 if (questLog->canBeFinished())
1604 {
1605 questLog->sendQuestComplete();
1606 questLog->updatePlayerFields();
1607 }
1608 }
1609 }
1610 return 0;
1611}
1612
1613int LuaUnit::SendAreaTriggerMessage(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1614{
1615 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
1616 return 0;
1617
1618 const char* msg = luaL_checkstring(L, 1);
1619 if (!msg)
1620 return 0;
1621
1622 dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->sendAreaTriggerMessage(msg);
1623 return 0;
1624}
1625
1626int LuaUnit::SendBroadcastMessage(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1627{
1628 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
1629 return 0;
1630
1631 const char* msg = luaL_checkstring(L, 1);
1632 if (!msg)
1633 return 0;
1634
1635 dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->broadcastMessage(msg);
1636 return 0;
1637}
1638
1639int LuaUnit::TeleportUnit(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1640{
1641 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
1642 return 0;
1643
1644 const uint32_t mapId = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
1645 const float posX = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 2);
1646 const float posY = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 3);
1647 const float posZ = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 4);
1648 const float Orientation = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 5);
1649
1650 if (!posX || !posY || !posZ)
1651 {
1652 DLLLogDetail("LuaEngineMgr : LUATeleporter ERROR - Wrong Coordinates given (Map, X, Y, Z) :: Map%f%s%f%s%f%s%f", mapId, " X", posX, " Y", posY, " Z", posZ);
1653 return 0;
1654 }
1655
1656 const LocationVector vec(posX, posY, posZ, Orientation);
1657 dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->safeTeleport(mapId, 0, vec);
1658 return 0;
1659}
1660
1661int LuaUnit::GetHealth(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1662{
1663 if (!ptr)
1664 lua_pushinteger(L, 0);
1665 else
1666 lua_pushinteger(L, ptr->getHealth());
1667 return 1;
1668}
1669
1670int LuaUnit::GetMaxHealth(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1671{
1672 if (!ptr)
1673 lua_pushinteger(L, 0);
1674 else
1675 lua_pushinteger(L, ptr->getMaxHealth());
1676
1677 return 1;
1678}
1679
1680int LuaUnit::SetHealth(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1681{
1682 const uint32_t val = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
1683 if (ptr != nullptr && val > 0)
1684 {
1685 if (val > ptr->getMaxHealth())
1686 ptr->setHealth(ptr->getMaxHealth());
1687 else
1688 ptr->setHealth(val);
1689 }
1690 return 0;
1691}
1692
1693int LuaUnit::SetMaxHealth(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1694{
1695 const uint32_t val = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
1696 if (ptr != nullptr && val > 0)
1697 {
1698 if (val < ptr->getHealth())
1699 ptr->setHealth(val);
1700
1701 ptr->setMaxHealth(val);
1702 }
1703 return 0;
1704}
1705
1706int LuaUnit::WipeHateList(lua_State* /*L*/, Unit* ptr)
1707{
1708 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
1709 return 0;
1710
1711 ptr->wipeHateList();
1712 ptr->getThreatManager().clearAllThreat();
1713 ptr->getThreatManager().removeMeFromThreatLists();
1714 return 0;
1715}
1716
1717int LuaUnit::WipeTargetList(lua_State* /*L*/, Unit* ptr)
1718{
1719 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
1720 return 0;
1721
1722 ptr->getThreatManager().clearAllThreat();
1723 ptr->getThreatManager().removeMeFromThreatLists();
1724 return 0;
1725}
1726
1727int LuaUnit::WipeCurrentTarget(lua_State* /*L*/, Unit* ptr)
1728{
1729 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
1730 return 0;
1731
1732 ptr->getThreatManager().clearThreat(ptr->getAIInterface()->getCurrentTarget());
1733 return 0;
1734}
1735
1736int LuaUnit::GetPlayerClass(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1737{
1738 if (!ptr || !ptr->isPlayer())
1739 {
1740 lua_pushstring(L, "Unknown");
1741 return 1;
1742 }
1743 const int plrclass = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->getClass();
1744
1745 switch (plrclass)
1746 {
1747 case 1:
1748 lua_pushstring(L, "Warrior");
1749 break;
1750 case 2:
1751 lua_pushstring(L, "Paladin");
1752 break;
1753 case 3:
1754 lua_pushstring(L, "Hunter");
1755 break;
1756 case 4:
1757 lua_pushstring(L, "Rogue");
1758 break;
1759 case 5:
1760 lua_pushstring(L, "Priest");
1761 break;
1762 case 6:
1763 lua_pushstring(L, "Death Knight");
1764 break;
1765 case 7:
1766 lua_pushstring(L, "Shaman");
1767 break;
1768 case 8:
1769 lua_pushstring(L, "Mage");
1770 break;
1771 case 9:
1772 lua_pushstring(L, "Warlock");
1773 break;
1774 //case 10:
1775 case 11:
1776 lua_pushstring(L, "Druid");
1777 break;
1778 default:
1779 lua_pushstring(L, "Unknown");
1780 break;
1781 }
1782
1783 return 1;
1784}
1785
1786
1787int LuaUnit::ClearHateList(lua_State* /*L*/, Unit* ptr)
1788{
1789 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
1790 return 0;
1791
1792 ptr->clearHateList();
1793 return 0;
1794}
1795
1796int LuaUnit::SetMana(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1797{
1798 const uint32_t val = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
1799 if (ptr != nullptr)
1800 ptr->setPower(POWER_TYPE_MANA, val);
1801 return 0;
1802}
1803
1804int LuaUnit::SetMaxMana(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1805{
1806 const uint32_t val = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
1807 if (ptr != nullptr && val > 0)
1808 {
1809 if (val < ptr->getPower(POWER_TYPE_MANA))
1810 ptr->setPower(POWER_TYPE_MANA, val);
1811 ptr->setMaxPower(POWER_TYPE_MANA, val);
1812 }
1813 return 1;
1814}
1815
1816int LuaUnit::GetPlayerRace(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1817{
1818 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
1819 {
1820 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
1821 return 1;
1822 }
1823 lua_pushinteger(L, dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->getRace());
1824 return 1;
1825}
1826
1827int LuaUnit::SetFlying(lua_State* /*L*/, Unit* ptr)
1828{
1829 if (ptr == nullptr)
1830 return 0;
1831
1832 ptr->setMoveHover(true);
1833 ptr->getAIInterface()->setMeleeDisabled(true);
1834 ptr->setMoveCanFly(true);
1835 ptr->emote(EMOTE_ONESHOT_LIFTOFF);
1836 return 0;
1837}
1838
1839int LuaUnit::Land(lua_State* /*L*/, Unit* ptr)
1840{
1841 if (ptr == nullptr)
1842 return 0;
1843
1844 ptr->setMoveHover(false);
1845 ptr->setMoveCanFly(false);
1846 ptr->getAIInterface()->setMeleeDisabled(false);
1847 ptr->emote(EMOTE_ONESHOT_LAND);
1848 return 0;
1849}
1850
1851int LuaUnit::HasAura(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1852{
1853 const uint32_t spellid = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
1854 if (!ptr || !spellid)
1855 return 0;
1856
1857 if (ptr->hasAurasWithId(spellid))
1858 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
1859 else
1860 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
1861
1862 return 1;
1863}
1864
1865int LuaUnit::ReturnToSpawnPoint(lua_State* /*L*/, Unit* ptr)
1866{
1867 if (ptr == nullptr)
1868 return 0;
1869
1870 if (ptr->isCreature())
1871 {
1872 const float x = ptr->GetSpawnX();
1873 const float y = ptr->GetSpawnY();
1874 const float z = ptr->GetSpawnZ();
1875 const float o = ptr->GetSpawnO();
1876
1877 ptr->getAIInterface()->moveTo(x, y, z);
1878 ptr->SetOrientation(o);
1879 }
1880
1881 return 0;
1882}
1883
1884int LuaUnit::GetGUID(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1885{
1886 if (!ptr)
1887 return 0;
1888
1889 PUSH_GUID(L, ptr->getGuid());
1890 return 1;
1891}
1892
1893int LuaUnit::GetDistance(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1894{
1895 if (!ptr)
1896 return 0;
1897
1898 Object* target = CHECK_OBJECT(L, 1);
1899 lua_pushnumber(L, (float)ptr->GetDistance2dSq(target));
1900 return 1;
1901}
1902
1903int LuaUnit::GetDistanceYards(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1904{
1905 const Object* target = CHECK_OBJECT(L, 1);
1906 if (!ptr || !target)
1907 return 0;
1908
1909 LocationVector vec = ptr->GetPosition();
1910 lua_pushnumber(L, (float)vec.Distance(target->GetPosition()));
1911 return 1;
1912}

1917 return 0;
1918
1919 const Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
1920 lua_pushnumber(L, plr->getDuelState());
1921
1922 return 1;
1923}
1924
1925int LuaUnit::GetCreatureNearestCoords(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1926{
1927 if (!ptr)
1928 return 0;
1929
1930 const uint32_t entryid = CHECK_ULONG(L, 4);
1931 const float x = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 1);
1932 const float y = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 2);
1933 const float z = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 3);
1934 PUSH_UNIT(L, ptr->getWorldMap()->getInterface()->getCreatureNearestCoords(x, y, z, entryid));
1935 return 1;
1936}
1937
1938int LuaUnit::GetGameObjectNearestCoords(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1939{
1940 if (!ptr)
1941 return 0;
1942
1943 const uint32_t entryid = CHECK_ULONG(L, 4);
1944 const float x = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 1);
1945 const float y = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 2);
1946 const float z = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 3);
1947 PUSH_GO(L, ptr->getWorldMap()->getInterface()->getGameObjectNearestCoords(x, y, z, entryid));
1948 return 1;
1949}
1950
1951int LuaUnit::SetPosition(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1952{
1953 const float x = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 1);
1954 const float y = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 2);
1955 const float z = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 3);
1956 const float o = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 4);
1957 ptr->setFacing(o);
1958 ptr->SetOrientation(o);
1959
1960 WorldPacket data(SMSG_MONSTER_MOVE, 50);
1961 data << ptr->GetNewGUID();
1962 data << uint8_t(0);
1963 data << ptr->GetPositionX();
1964 data << ptr->GetPositionY();
1965 data << ptr->GetPositionZ();
1966 data << Util::getMSTime();
1967 data << uint8_t(0x00);
1968 data << uint32_t(256);
1969 data << uint32_t(1);
1970 data << uint32_t(1);
1971 data << x << y << z;
1972
1973 ptr->sendMessageToSet(&data, true);
1974 ptr->SetPosition(x, y, z, o, true);
1975 return 0;
1976}
1977
1978int LuaUnit::GetLandHeight(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1979{
1980 const float x = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 1);
1981 const float y = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 2);
1982 if (!ptr || !x || !y)
1983 return 0;
1984
1985 const float lH = ptr->getWorldMap()->getGridHeight(x, y);
1986 lua_pushnumber(L, lH);
1987 return 1;
1988}
1989
1990int LuaUnit::IsInPhase(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1991{
1992 const uint32_t phase = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
1993 lua_pushboolean(L, ((ptr->m_phase & phase) != 0) ? 1 : 0);
1994 return 1;
1995}
1996
1997int LuaUnit::HasFlag(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
1998{
1999 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
2000 {
2001 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
2002 return 1;
2003 }
2004 /*uint16_t index = static_cast<uint16_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
2005 uint32_t flag = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
2006 lua_pushboolean(L, ptr->HasFlag(index, flag) ? 1 : 0);*/
2007 return 1;
2008}
2009
2010int LuaUnit::QuestAddStarter(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2011{
2012 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
2013 return 0;
2014
2015 Creature* unit = dynamic_cast<Creature*>(ptr);
2016 const uint32_t quest_id = (uint32_t)luaL_checknumber(L, 1);
2017 if (!(unit->getNpcFlags() & UNIT_NPC_FLAG_QUESTGIVER))
2018 unit->addNpcFlags(UNIT_NPC_FLAG_QUESTGIVER);
2019
2020 if (!quest_id)
2021 return 0;
2022
2023 QuestProperties const* qst = sMySQLStore.getQuestProperties(quest_id);
2024 if (!qst)
2025 return 0;
2026
2027 const uint32_t quest_giver = unit->getEntry();
2028
2029 char my_query1[200];
2030 sprintf(my_query1, "SELECT id FROM creature_quest_starter WHERE id = %d AND quest = %d AND min_build <= %u AND max_build >= %u", quest_giver, quest_id, VERSION_STRING, VERSION_STRING);
2031 const auto selectResult1 = WorldDatabase.Query(my_query1);
2032 if (selectResult1 == nullptr)
2033 {
2034 char my_insert1[200];
2035 sprintf(my_insert1, "INSERT INTO creature_quest_starter (id, quest) VALUES (%d,%d,%u,%u)", quest_giver, quest_id, VERSION_STRING, VERSION_STRING);
2036 WorldDatabase.Execute(my_insert1);
2037 }
2038
2039 sQuestMgr.LoadExtraQuestStuff();
2040
2041 QuestRelation* qstrel = new QuestRelation;
2042 qstrel->qst = qst;
2043 qstrel->type = QUESTGIVER_QUEST_START;
2044
2045 uint8_t qstrelid;
2046 if (unit->HasQuests())
2047 {
2048 qstrelid = (uint8_t)unit->GetQuestRelation(quest_id);
2049 unit->DeleteQuest(qstrel);
2050 }
2051 unit->_LoadQuests();
2052 return 0;
2053}
2054
2055int LuaUnit::QuestAddFinisher(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2056{
2057 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
2058 return 0;
2059
2060 Creature* unit = dynamic_cast<Creature*>(ptr);
2061 const uint32_t quest_id = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
2062 if (!(unit->getNpcFlags() & UNIT_NPC_FLAG_QUESTGIVER))
2063 unit->addNpcFlags(UNIT_NPC_FLAG_QUESTGIVER);
2064
2065 if (!quest_id)
2066 return 0;
2067
2068 QuestProperties const* qst = sMySQLStore.getQuestProperties(quest_id);
2069 if (!qst)
2070 return 0;
2071
2072 const uint32_t quest_giver = unit->getEntry();
2073
2074 char my_query1[200];
2075 sprintf(my_query1, "SELECT id FROM creature_quest_finisher WHERE id = %d AND quest = %d AND min_build <= %u AND max_build >= %u", quest_giver, quest_id, VERSION_STRING, VERSION_STRING);
2076 const auto selectResult1 = WorldDatabase.Query(my_query1);
2077 if (selectResult1 == nullptr)
2078 {
2079 char my_insert1[200];
2080 sprintf(my_insert1, "INSERT INTO creature_quest_finisher (id, quest, min_build, max_build) VALUES (%d,%d,%u,%u)", quest_giver, quest_id, VERSION_STRING, VERSION_STRING);
2081 WorldDatabase.Execute(my_insert1);
2082 }
2083
2084 sQuestMgr.LoadExtraQuestStuff();
2085
2086 QuestRelation* qstrel = new QuestRelation;
2087 qstrel->qst = qst;
2088 qstrel->type = QUESTGIVER_QUEST_END;
2089
2090 uint8_t qstrelid;
2091 if (unit->HasQuests())
2092 {
2093 qstrelid = (uint8_t)unit->GetQuestRelation(quest_id);
2094 unit->DeleteQuest(qstrel);
2095 }
2096 unit->_LoadQuests();
2097 return 0;
2098}
2099
2100int LuaUnit::castSpellLoc(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2101{
2102 const float x = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 1);
2103 const float y = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 2);
2104 const float z = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 3);
2105 const uint32_t sp = CHECK_ULONG(L, 4);
2106 if (!sp || !ptr)
2107 return 0;
2108
2109 ptr->castSpellLoc(LocationVector(x, y, z), sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(sp), true);
2110 return 0;
2111}
2112
2113int LuaUnit::FullCastSpellAoF(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2114{
2115 const float x = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 1);
2116 const float y = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 2);
2117 const float z = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 3);
2118 const uint32_t sp = CHECK_ULONG(L, 4);
2119 if (!sp || !ptr)
2120 return 0;
2121
2122 ptr->castSpellLoc(LocationVector(x, y, z), sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(sp), false);
2123 return 0;
2124}
2125
2126int LuaUnit::SetInFront(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2127{
2128 const Unit* target = CHECK_UNIT(L, 1);
2129 if (!target || !ptr)
2130 return 0;
2131
2132 ptr->setInFront(target);
2133 return 0;
2134}

2219 if (range)
2220 ptr->getAIInterface()->addBoundary(std::make_unique<CircleBoundary>(ptr->GetPosition(), range), true);
2221 return 0;
2222}

2316int LuaUnit::HandleEvent(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2317{
2318 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
2319 return 0;
2320
2321 Unit* target = CHECK_UNIT(L, 1);
2322 const uint32_t event_id = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
2323 const uint32_t misc_1 = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 3));
2324 ptr->getAIInterface()->handleEvent(event_id, target, misc_1);
2325 return 1;
2326}
2327
2328int LuaUnit::GetCurrentSpellId(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2329{
2330 if (!ptr)
2331 return 0;
2332
2333 uint32_t spellId = 0;
2334 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < CURRENT_SPELL_MAX; ++i)
2335 {
2336 if (ptr->getCurrentSpell(CurrentSpellType(i)) == nullptr)
2337 continue;
2338 spellId = ptr->getCurrentSpell(CurrentSpellType(i))->getSpellInfo()->getId();
2339 break;
2340 }
2341
2342 if (spellId != 0)
2343 lua_pushnumber(L, spellId);
2344 else
2345 lua_pushnil(L);
2346 return 1;
2347}
2348
2349int LuaUnit::GetCurrentSpell(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2350{
2351 if (!ptr)
2352 return 0;
2353
2354 Spell* curSpell = nullptr;
2355 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < CURRENT_SPELL_MAX; ++i)
2356 {
2357 if (ptr->getCurrentSpell(CurrentSpellType(i)) == nullptr)
2358 continue;
2359 curSpell = ptr->getCurrentSpell(CurrentSpellType(i));
2360 break;
2361 }
2362
2363 if (curSpell != nullptr)
2364 PUSH_SPELL(L, curSpell);
2365 else
2366 lua_pushnil(L);
2367 return 1;
2368}
2369
2370int LuaUnit::GetFloatValue(lua_State* /*L*/, Unit* /*ptr*/)

2372 /*uint16_t field = static_cast<uint16_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
2373 if (ptr)
2374 lua_pushnumber(L, ptr->getFloatValue(field));*/
2375 return 1;
2376}
2377
2378int LuaUnit::SendPacket(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2379{
2380 WorldPacket* data = CHECK_PACKET(L, 1);
2381 const int self = lua_toboolean(L, 2);
2382 if (data && ptr)
2383 ptr->sendMessageToSet(data, (self > 0) ? true : false);
2384 return 0;
2385}
2386
2387int LuaUnit::SendPacketToGroup(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2388{
2389 WorldPacket* data = CHECK_PACKET(L, 1);
2390 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
2391 return 0;
2392
2393 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
2394 if (!data)
2395 return 0;
2396
2397 if (plr->getGroup())
2398 plr->getGroup()->SendPacketToAll(data);
2399 return 0;
2400}
2401
2402int LuaUnit::SendPacketToPlayer(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2403{
2404 WorldPacket* data = CHECK_PACKET(L, 1);
2405 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
2406 return 0;
2407
2408 const Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
2409 if (data)
2410 plr->getSession()->SendPacket(data);
2411 return 0;
2412}

2492
2493int LuaUnit::AdvanceQuestObjective(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2494{
2495 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
2496 return 0;
2497
2498 const uint32_t questid = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
2499 const uint8_t objective = static_cast<uint8_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
2500 const Player* player = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
2501
2502 if (auto* questLog = player->getQuestLogByQuestId(questid))
2503 {
2504 questLog->setMobCountForIndex(objective, questLog->getMobCountByIndex(objective) + 1);
2505 questLog->sendUpdateAddKill(objective);
2506 if (questLog->canBeFinished())
2507 questLog->sendQuestComplete();
2508
2509 questLog->updatePlayerFields();
2510 }
2511 return 0;
2512}
2513
2514int LuaUnit::Heal(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2515{
2516 Unit* target = CHECK_UNIT(L, 1);
2517 const uint32_t spellid = CHECK_ULONG(L, 2);
2518 const uint32_t amount = CHECK_ULONG(L, 3);
2519 if (!target || !spellid || !amount || !ptr)
2520 return 0;
2521
2522 target->addSimpleHealingBatchEvent(amount, ptr, sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(spellid));
2523 return 0;
2524}
2525
2526int LuaUnit::Energize(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2527{
2528 Unit* target = CHECK_UNIT(L, 1);
2529 const uint32_t spellid = CHECK_ULONG(L, 2);
2530 const uint32_t amount = CHECK_ULONG(L, 3);
2531 uint32_t type = CHECK_ULONG(L, 4);
2532 if (!target || !spellid || !amount || !type || !ptr)
2533 return 0;
2534
2535 ptr->energize(target, spellid, amount, static_cast<PowerType>(type));
2536 return 0;
2537}
2538
2539int LuaUnit::SendChatMessageAlternateEntry(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2540{
2541 const uint32_t entry = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
2542 const uint8_t type = static_cast<uint8_t>(CHECK_ULONG(L, 2));
2543 const uint32_t lang = CHECK_ULONG(L, 3);
2544 const char* msg = luaL_checkstring(L, 4);
2545 if (!entry || !lang || !msg)
2546 return 0;
2547
2548 ptr->sendChatMessageAlternateEntry(entry, type, lang, msg);
2549 return 0;
2550}
2551
2552int LuaUnit::SendChatMessageToPlayer(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2553{
2554 const uint8_t type = static_cast<uint8_t>(CHECK_ULONG(L, 1));
2555 const uint32_t lang = CHECK_ULONG(L, 2);
2556 const char* msg = luaL_checkstring(L, 3);
2557 Player* plr = CHECK_PLAYER(L, 4);
2558 if (!plr || !msg || !ptr)
2559 return 0;
2560
2561 ptr->sendChatMessageToPlayer(type, lang, msg, plr);
2562 return 0;
2563}
2564
2565int LuaUnit::GetManaPct(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2566{
2567 if (!ptr)
2568 return 0;
2569
2570 if (ptr->getPowerType() == (uint8_t)POWER_TYPE_MANA)
2571 lua_pushnumber(L, (int)(ptr->getPower(POWER_TYPE_MANA) * 100.0f / ptr->getMaxPower(POWER_TYPE_MANA)));
2572 else
2573 lua_pushnil(L);
2574 return 1;
2575}
2576
2577int LuaUnit::GetPowerPct(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2578{
2579 if (!ptr)
2580 {
2581 lua_pushnil(L);
2582 return 1;
2583 }
2584 uint16_t powertype;
2585 if (luaL_optinteger(L, 1, -1) == -1)
2586 powertype = ptr->getPowerType();
2587 else
2588 powertype = static_cast<uint16_t>(luaL_optinteger(L, 1, -1));
2589
2590 lua_pushnumber(L, static_cast<int>(ptr->getPower(static_cast<PowerType>(powertype)) * 100.0f / ptr->getMaxPower(static_cast<PowerType>(powertype))));
2591 return 1;
2592}
2593
2594int LuaUnit::GetMana(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2595{
2596 if (ptr == nullptr)
2597 lua_pushinteger(L, 0);
2598 else
2599 lua_pushinteger(L, ptr->getPower(POWER_TYPE_MANA));
2600
2601 return 1;
2602}
2603

2608 lua_pushnil(L);

2614 else
2615 powertype = static_cast<uint16_t>(luaL_optinteger(L, 1, -1));
2616
2617 lua_pushnumber(L, ptr->getPower(static_cast<PowerType>(powertype)));
2618 return 1;
2619}

2645 return 1;

2647
2648int LuaUnit::SetPowerType(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2649{
2650 if (ptr == nullptr)
2651 return 0;
2652 /* POWER_TYPE_MANA = 0,
2653 POWER_TYPE_RAGE = 1,
2654 POWER_TYPE_FOCUS = 2,
2655 POWER_TYPE_ENERGY = 3,
2656 POWER_TYPE_HAPPINESS = 4,
2657 POWER_TYPE_RUNES = 5,
2658 POWER_TYPE_RUNIC_POWER = 6 */
2659
2660 uint8_t powertype;
2661 if (luaL_optinteger(L, 1, -1) == -1)
2662 powertype = static_cast<uint8_t>(ptr->getPowerType());
2663 else
2664 powertype = static_cast<uint8_t>(luaL_optinteger(L, 1, -1));
2665
2666 ptr->setPowerType(powertype);
2667 return 0;
2668}
2669
2670int LuaUnit::SetMaxPower(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2671{
2672 if (ptr == nullptr)
2673 return 0;
2674
2675 const uint32_t amount = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
2676 uint16_t powertype;
2677 if (luaL_optinteger(L, 2, -1) == -1)
2678 powertype = ptr->getPowerType();
2679 else
2680 powertype = static_cast<uint16_t>(luaL_optinteger(L, 2, -1));
2681
2682 ptr->setMaxPower(static_cast<PowerType>(powertype), amount);
2683 return 0;
2684}
2685
2686int LuaUnit::SetPower(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2687{
2688 if (ptr == nullptr)
2689 return 0;
2690
2691 const uint32_t amount = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
2692 uint32_t powertype;
2693 if (luaL_optinteger(L, 2, -1) == -1)
2694 powertype = ptr->getPowerType();
2695 else
2696 powertype = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_optinteger(L, 2, -1));
2697
2698 ptr->setPower(static_cast<PowerType>(powertype), amount);
2699 return 0;
2700}
2701
2702int LuaUnit::SetPowerPct(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2703{
2704 if (ptr == nullptr)
2705 return 0;
2706
2707 const uint32_t amount = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
2708 uint16_t powertype;
2709 if (luaL_optinteger(L, 2, -1) == -1)
2710 powertype = ptr->getPowerType();
2711 else
2712 powertype = static_cast<uint16_t>(luaL_optinteger(L, 2, -1));
2713
2714 ptr->setPower(static_cast<PowerType>(powertype), static_cast<int>(amount / 100) * (ptr->getMaxPower(static_cast<PowerType>(powertype))));
2715 return 0;
2716}
2717
2718int LuaUnit::GetPowerType(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)

2721 return 0;

2724 return 1;
2725}
2726
2727int LuaUnit::Strike(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2728{
2729 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
2730 {
2731 lua_pushboolean(L, 0); return 1;
2732 }
2733 Unit* target = CHECK_UNIT(L, 1);
2734 const WeaponDamageType weapon_damage_type = static_cast<WeaponDamageType>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
2735 const uint32_t sp = CHECK_ULONG(L, 3);
2736 const int32_t adddmg = static_cast<int32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 4));
2737 const uint32_t exclusive_damage = CHECK_ULONG(L, 5);
2738 const int32_t pct_dmg_mod = static_cast<int32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 6));
2739
2740 if (!target)
2741 return 0;
2742 ptr->strike(target, weapon_damage_type, sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(sp), adddmg, pct_dmg_mod, exclusive_damage, false, false);
2743 return 0;
2744}
2745
2746int LuaUnit::SetAttackTimer(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2747{
2748 if (ptr == nullptr)
2749 return 0;
2750
2751 const int32_t timer = static_cast<int32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
2752 const bool offhand = CHECK_BOOL(L, 2);
2753 if (!timer)
2754 return 0;
2755 ptr->setAttackTimer(offhand == true ? OFFHAND : MELEE, timer);
2756 return 0;
2757}
2758
2759int LuaUnit::Kill(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2760{
2761 Unit* target = CHECK_UNIT(L, 1);
2762 if (!ptr || !target)
2763 return 0;
2764 ptr->dealDamage(target, target->getHealth(), 0);
2765 return 0;
2766}
2767
2768int LuaUnit::DealDamage(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2769{
2770 Unit* target = CHECK_UNIT(L, 1);
2771 const uint32_t damage = CHECK_ULONG(L, 2);
2772 const uint32_t spellid = CHECK_ULONG(L, 3);
2773 if (!ptr || !target)
2774 return 0;
2775 ptr->dealDamage(target, damage, spellid, false);
2776 return 0;
2777}
2778
2779int LuaUnit::setCurrentTarget(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2780{
2781 Unit* target = CHECK_UNIT(L, 1);
2782 if (ptr && target)
2783 ptr->getAIInterface()->setCurrentTarget(target);
2784 return 0;
2785}
2786
2787int LuaUnit::getCurrentTarget(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2788{
2789 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
2790 {
2791 return 0;
2792 }
2793 PUSH_UNIT(L, ptr->getAIInterface()->getCurrentTarget());
2794 return 1;
2795}
2796
2797int LuaUnit::SetPetOwner(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2798{
2799 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
2800 {
2801 return 0;
2802 }
2803 Unit* owner = CHECK_UNIT(L, 1);
2804 if (owner)
2805 ptr->getAIInterface()->setPetOwner(owner);
2806 return 0;
2807}

2887
2888int LuaUnit::SetPacified(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2889{
2890 const bool pacified = CHECK_BOOL(L, 1);
2891 if (!ptr)
2892 return 0;
2893 ptr->m_pacified = pacified ? 1 : 0;
2894 if (pacified)
2895 ptr->addUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_PACIFIED | UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED);
2896 else
2897 ptr->removeUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_PACIFIED | UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED);
2898 return 0;
2899}

2914
2915int LuaUnit::CreateGuardian(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2916{
2917 const uint32_t entry = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
2918 //uint32_t duration = CHECK_ULONG(L, 2);
2919 const float angle = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 3);
2920 const uint32_t lvl = CHECK_ULONG(L, 4);
2921
2922 if ((ptr == nullptr) || (entry == 0) || (lvl == 0))
2923 return 0;
2924
2925 CreatureProperties const* cp = sMySQLStore.getCreatureProperties(entry);
2926 if (cp == nullptr)
2927 return 0;
2928
2929 LocationVector v(ptr->GetPosition());
2930 v.x += (3 * (cosf(angle + v.o)));
2931 v.y += (3 * (sinf(angle + v.o)));
2932
2933 Summon* guardian = ptr->getWorldMap()->summonCreature(entry, v);
2934 if (guardian == nullptr)
2935 return 0;
2936
2937 guardian->load(cp, ptr, v, 0, 0);
2938 guardian->PushToWorld(ptr->getWorldMap());
2939
2940 PUSH_UNIT(L, guardian);
2941
2942 return 1;
2943}
2944
2945int LuaUnit::IsInArc(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2946{
2947 Unit* target = CHECK_UNIT(L, 1);
2948 const float degrees = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 2);
2949 if (!target || !ptr || !degrees)
2950 return 0;
2951
2952 if (ptr->isInArc(target, degrees))
2953 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
2954 else
2955 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
2956
2957 return 1;
2958}
2959
2960int LuaUnit::IsInWater(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2961{
2962 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
2963 {
2964 return 0;
2965 }
2966
2967 if (dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->m_underwaterState)
2968 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
2969 else
2970 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
2971
2972 return 1;
2973}

2985int LuaUnit::GetUnitByGUID(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2986{
2987 const uint64_t guid = CHECK_GUID(L, 1);
2988 if (ptr && guid)
2989 PUSH_UNIT(L, ptr->getWorldMap()->getUnit(guid));
2990 return 1;
2991}
2992
2993int LuaUnit::GetAITargets(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
2994{
2995 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
2996 {
2997 return 0;
2998 }
2999 Unit* ret = nullptr;
3000 lua_newtable(L);
3001 int count = 0;
3002 for (const ThreatReference* ref : ptr->getThreatManager().getModifiableThreatList())
3003 {
3004 ret = ptr->getWorldMap()->getUnit(ref->getOwner()->getGuid());
3005 count++;
3006 lua_pushvalue(L, count);
3007 PUSH_UNIT(L, ret);
3008 lua_rawset(L, -3);
3009 }
3010 return 1;
3011}
3012
3013int LuaUnit::GetInRangeObjectsCount(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3014{
3015 if (ptr)
3016 lua_pushnumber(L, static_cast<lua_Number>(ptr->getInRangeObjectsCount()));
3017 return 1;
3018}
3019
3020int LuaUnit::GetInRangePlayers(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3021{
3022 if (!ptr)
3023 return 0;
3024 uint32_t count = 0;
3025 lua_newtable(L);
3026 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangePlayersSet())
3027 {
3028 if (itr && itr->isPlayer())
3029 {
3030 count++;
3031 lua_pushinteger(L, count);
3032 PUSH_UNIT(L, itr);
3033 lua_rawset(L, -3);
3034 }
3035 }
3036 return 1;
3037}
3038
3039int LuaUnit::GetGroupPlayers(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3040{
3041 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
3042 return 0;
3043
3044 Player* _player = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
3045
3046 uint32_t count = 0;
3047 lua_newtable(L);
3048 if (const auto group = _player->getGroup())
3049 {
3050 group->getLock().lock();
3051 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < group->GetSubGroupCount(); i++)
3052 {
3053 const SubGroup* sgrp = group->GetSubGroup(i);
3054 for (const auto itr : sgrp->getGroupMembers())
3055 {
3056 if (Player* loggedInPlayer = sObjectMgr.getPlayer(itr->guid))
3057 {
3058 if (loggedInPlayer->getZoneId() == _player->getZoneId() && _player->GetInstanceID() == loggedInPlayer->GetInstanceID())
3059 {
3060 count++;
3061 lua_pushinteger(L, count);
3062 PUSH_UNIT(L, loggedInPlayer);
3063 lua_rawset(L, -3);
3064 }
3065 }
3066 }
3067 }
3068 group->getLock().unlock();
3069 }
3070 return 1;
3071}
3072
3073int LuaUnit::GetDungeonDifficulty(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3074{
3075 /*
3076 MODE_NORMAL_10MEN = 0,
3077 MODE_NORMAL_25MEN = 1,
3078 MODE_HEROIC_10MEN = 2,
3079 MODE_HEROIC_25MEN = 3
3080 */
3081 if (ptr->isPlayer())
3082 {
3083 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
3084 if (plr->getGroup())
3085 {
3086 if (plr->getGroup()->getGroupType() == GROUP_TYPE_PARTY)
3087 lua_pushnumber(L, plr->getGroup()->m_difficulty);
3088 else
3089 lua_pushnumber(L, plr->getGroup()->m_raiddifficulty);
3090 }
3091 else
3092 {
3093 if (!plr->isInInstance())
3094 return 0;
3095 const WorldMap* pInstance = sMapMgr.findWorldMap(plr->GetMapId(), plr->GetInstanceID());
3096 lua_pushinteger(L, pInstance->getDifficulty());
3097 }
3098 return 1;
3099 }
3100
3101 if (!ptr->isInInstance())
3102 {
3103 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
3104 return 1;
3105 }
3106 const WorldMap* pInstance = sMapMgr.findWorldMap(ptr->GetMapId(), ptr->GetInstanceID());
3107 lua_pushinteger(L, pInstance->getDifficulty());
3108
3109 return 1;
3110}
3111
3112int LuaUnit::IsGroupFull(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3113{
3114 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
3115 return 0;
3116
3117 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
3118 if (plr->getGroup())
3119 lua_pushboolean(L, plr->getGroup()->IsFull() ? 1 : 0);
3120
3121 return 1;
3122}

3137int LuaUnit::SetGroupLeader(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3138{
3139 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
3140 {
3141 return 0;
3142 }
3143
3144 Player* _plr = CHECK_PLAYER(L, 1);
3145 const bool silent = CHECK_BOOL(L, 2);
3146 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
3147 if (plr->getGroup())
3148 plr->getGroup()->SetLeader(_plr, silent);
3149 return 0;

3152int LuaUnit::AddGroupMember(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3153{
3154 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
3155 {
3156 return 0;
3157 }
3158
3159 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
3160 const Player* _plr = CHECK_PLAYER(L, 1);
3161 const int32_t subgroup = static_cast<int32_t>(luaL_optinteger(L, 2, -1));
3162 if (plr->getGroup())
3163 plr->getGroup()->AddMember(_plr->getPlayerInfo(), subgroup);
3164 return 0;
3165}
3166
3167int LuaUnit::SetDungeonDifficulty(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3168{
3169 /*
3170 MODE_NORMAL_10MEN = 0,
3171 MODE_NORMAL_25MEN = 1,
3172 MODE_HEROIC_10MEN = 2,
3173 MODE_HEROIC_25MEN = 3
3174 */
3175 const uint8_t difficulty = static_cast<uint8_t>(CHECK_ULONG(L, 1));
3176 if (!ptr)
3177 return 0;
3178 if (ptr->isInInstance())
3179 {
3180 if (ptr->isPlayer())
3181 {
3182 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
3183 if (plr->getGroup())
3184 (difficulty > 1 ? plr->getGroup()->m_difficulty : plr->getGroup()->m_raiddifficulty) = difficulty;
3185 else
3186 {
3187 WorldMap* pInstance = sMapMgr.findWorldMap(plr->GetMapId(), plr->GetInstanceID());
3188 pInstance->setSpawnMode(difficulty);
3189 }
3190 }
3191 else
3192 {
3193 WorldMap* pInstance = sMapMgr.findWorldMap(ptr->GetMapId(), ptr->GetInstanceID());
3194 pInstance->setSpawnMode(difficulty);
3195 }
3196 }
3197 return 0;
3198}
3199

3201{
3202 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
3203 {
3204 return 0;
3205 }
3206
3207 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
3208 if (plr->getGroup())
3209 plr->getGroup()->ExpandToRaid();
3210 return 0;
3211}

3213int LuaUnit::GetInRangeGameObjects(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3214{
3215 if (!ptr)
3216 return 0;
3217
3218 lua_newtable(L);
3219 uint32_t count = 0;
3220 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangeObjectsSet())
3221 {
3222 if (itr && itr->isGameObject())
3223 {
3224 count++;
3225 lua_pushinteger(L, count);
3226 PUSH_GO(L, itr);
3227 lua_rawset(L, -3);
3228 }
3229 }
3230 return 1;
3231}

3260 return 0;

3265int LuaUnit::CalcAngle(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3266{
3267 const float x = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 1);
3268 const float y = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 2);
3269 const float x2 = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 3);
3270 const float y2 = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 4);
3271 if (!x || !y || !x2 || !y2 || !ptr)
3272 return 0;
3273 lua_pushnumber(L, ptr->calcAngle(x, y, x2, y2));
3274 return 1;
3275}
3276
3277int LuaUnit::CalcRadAngle(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3278{
3279 const float x = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 1);
3280 const float y = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 2);
3281 const float dx = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 3);
3282 const float dy = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 4);
3283
3284 if (!x || !y || !dx || !dy || !ptr)
3285 return 0;
3286
3287 const float ang = ptr->calcRadAngle(x, y, dx, dy);
3288 lua_pushnumber(L, ang);
3289
3290 return 1;
3291}

3358
3359int LuaUnit::SetDeathState(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3360{
3361 const int state = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
3362 if (ptr)
3363 {
3364 switch (state)
3365 {
3366 case 0:
3367 ptr->setDeathState(ALIVE);
3368 break;
3369 case 1:
3370 ptr->setDeathState(JUST_DIED);
3371 break;
3372 case 2:
3373 ptr->setDeathState(CORPSE);
3374 break;
3375 case 3:
3376 ptr->setDeathState(DEAD);
3377 break;
3378 }
3379 }
3380 return 0;
3381}

3391int LuaUnit::SetBindPoint(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3392{
3393 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
3394 return 0;
3395
3396 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
3397 const float x = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 1);
3398 const float y = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 2);
3399 const float z = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 3);
3400 const float o = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 4);
3401 const uint32_t map = CHECK_ULONG(L, 5);
3402 const uint32_t zone = CHECK_ULONG(L, 6);
3403 if (!x || !y || !z || !o || !zone)
3404 return 0;
3405
3406 plr->setBindPoint(x, y, z, o, map, zone);
3407 return 0;
3408}

3430
3431int LuaUnit::Unpossess(lua_State* /*L*/, Unit* ptr)

3441
3442int LuaUnit::RemoveFromWorld(lua_State* /*L*/, Unit* ptr)
3443{
3444 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
3445 {
3446 return 0;
3447 }
3448 Creature* unit = dynamic_cast<Creature*>(ptr);
3449 if (unit->IsInWorld())
3450 {
3451 if (unit->m_spawn)
3452 {
3453 const uint32_t cellx = uint32_t(((Map::Terrain::_maxX - unit->m_spawn->x) / Map::Cell::cellSize));
3454 const uint32_t celly = uint32_t(((Map::Terrain::_maxY - unit->m_spawn->y) / Map::Cell::cellSize));
3455
3456 if (cellx <= Map::Cell::_sizeX && celly <= Map::Cell::_sizeY)
3457 {
3458 CellSpawns* sp = unit->getWorldMap()->getBaseMap()->getSpawnsList(cellx, celly);
3459 if (sp != nullptr)
3460 {
3461 for (CreatureSpawnList::iterator itr = sp->CreatureSpawns.begin(); itr != sp->CreatureSpawns.end(); ++itr)
3462 if ((*itr) == unit->m_spawn)
3463 {
3464 sp->CreatureSpawns.erase(itr);
3465 break;
3466 }
3467 }
3468 delete unit->m_spawn;
3469 unit->m_spawn = nullptr;
3470 }
3471 }
3472 unit->RemoveFromWorld(false, true);
3473 }
3474 return 0;
3475}
3476
3477int LuaUnit::GetFaction(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3478{
3479 if (ptr)
3480 lua_pushnumber(L, ptr->getFactionTemplate());
3481 return 1;
3482}
3483
3484int LuaUnit::SpellNonMeleeDamageLog(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3485{
3486 Unit* pVictim = CHECK_UNIT(L, 1);
3487 const uint32_t spellid = CHECK_ULONG(L, 2);
3488 const uint32_t damage = CHECK_ULONG(L, 3);
3489 const uint8_t effIndex = CHECK_UINT8(L, 4);
3490 const bool isTriggered = CHECK_BOOL(L, 5);
3491 if (pVictim && spellid && damage)
3492 {
3493 ptr->doSpellDamage(pVictim, spellid, static_cast<float_t>(damage), effIndex, isTriggered);
3494 }
3495 return 0;
3496}
3497
3498int LuaUnit::NoRespawn(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3499{
3500 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
3501 {
3502 return 0;
3503 }
3504 const bool enabled = CHECK_BOOL(L, 1);
3505 dynamic_cast<Creature*>(ptr)->m_noRespawn = enabled;
3506 return 0;
3507}
