3514 return 1;
3515}
3516
3517int LuaUnit::AttackReaction(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3518{
3519 Unit* target = CHECK_UNIT(L, 1);
3520 const uint32_t damage = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
3521 //uint32_t spell = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 3));
3522 if (ptr && target && damage)
3523 {
3524 ptr->getAIInterface()->onHostileAction(target);
3525 ptr->getThreatManager().addThreat(target, static_cast<float>(damage));
3526 }
3527 return 0;
3528}
3529
3530int LuaUnit::eventCastSpell(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3531{
3532 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
3533 {
3534 return 0;
3535 }
3536
3537 Unit* target = CHECK_UNIT(L, 1);
3538 const uint32_t sp = CHECK_ULONG(L, 2);
3539 const uint32_t delay = CHECK_ULONG(L, 3);
3540 const uint32_t repeats = CHECK_ULONG(L, 4);
3541 if (sp)
3542 {
3543 switch (ptr->getObjectTypeId())
3544 {
3545 case TYPEID_PLAYER:
3546 sEventMgr.AddEvent(ptr, &Player::eventCastSpell, target, sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(sp), EVENT_PLAYER_UPDATE, delay, repeats, EVENT_FLAG_DO_NOT_EXECUTE_IN_WORLD_CONTEXT);
3547 break;
3548 case TYPEID_UNIT:
3549 sEventMgr.AddEvent(ptr, &Unit::eventCastSpell, target, sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(sp), EVENT_CREATURE_UPDATE, delay, repeats, EVENT_FLAG_DO_NOT_EXECUTE_IN_WORLD_CONTEXT);
3550 break;
3551 }
3552 }
3553 return 0;
3554}
3555
3556int LuaUnit::IsPlayerMoving(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3557{
3558 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
3559 {
3560 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
3561 return 1;
3562 }
3563 lua_pushboolean(L, (dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->isMoving()) ? 1 : 0);
3564 return 1;
3565}
3566
3567int LuaUnit::IsPlayerAttacking(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3568{
3569 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
3570 {
3571 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
3572 return 1;
3573 }
3574
3575 if (dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->isAttacking())
3576 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
3577 else
3578 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
3579 return 1;
3580}
3581
3582int LuaUnit::GetFactionStanding(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3583{
3584 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
3585 {
3586 return 0;
3587 }
3588
3589 const uint32_t faction = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
3590 if (faction)
3591 {
3592 switch (dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->getFactionStandingRank(faction))
3593 {
3594 case STANDING_HATED:
3595 lua_pushstring(L, "Hated");
3596 break;
3597 case STANDING_HOSTILE:
3598 lua_pushstring(L, "Hostile");
3599 break;
3600 case STANDING_UNFRIENDLY:
3601 lua_pushstring(L, "Unfriendly");
3602 break;
3603 case STANDING_NEUTRAL:
3604 lua_pushstring(L, "Neutral");
3605 break;
3606 case STANDING_FRIENDLY:
3607 lua_pushstring(L, "Friendly");
3608 break;
3609 case STANDING_HONORED:
3610 lua_pushstring(L, "Honored");
3611 break;
3612 case STANDING_REVERED:
3613 lua_pushstring(L, "Revered");
3614 break;
3615 case STANDING_EXALTED:
3616 lua_pushstring(L, "Exalted");
3617 break;
3618 }
3619 }
3620 return 1;
3621}
3622
3623int LuaUnit::SetPlayerAtWar(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3624{
3625 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
3626 {
3627 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
3628 return 1;
3629 }
3630 const uint32_t faction = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
3631 const bool set = CHECK_BOOL(L, 3);
3632 if (faction)
3633 {
3634 dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->setFactionAtWar(faction, set);
3635 }
3636 return 0;
3637}
3638
3639int LuaUnit::SetPlayerStanding(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3640{
3641 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
3642 {
3643 return 0;
3644 }
3645
3646 const uint32_t faction = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
3647 const int32_t value = static_cast<int32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
3648 if (faction && value)
3649 dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->setFactionStanding(faction, value);
3650 return 0;
3651}
3652
3653int LuaUnit::SetPlayerSpeed(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3654{
3655 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
3656 {
3657 return 0;
3658 }
3659
3660 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
3661 const float Speed = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 1);
3662 if (Speed < 1 || Speed > 255)
3663 return 0;
3664 plr->setSpeedRate(TYPE_RUN, Speed, true);
3665 plr->setSpeedRate(TYPE_SWIM, Speed, true);
3666 plr->setSpeedRate(TYPE_RUN_BACK, Speed / 2, true);
3667 plr->setSpeedRate(TYPE_FLY, Speed * 2, true);
3668 return 0;
3669}

3676 }
3677
3678 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
3679 const uint32_t honor = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
3680 plr->addHonor(honor, true);
3681 return 0;
3682}

3718 ptr->getThreatManager().clearThreat(target);

3722int LuaUnit::HasItem(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3723{
3724 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
3725 {
3726 return 0;
3727 }
3728
3729 const uint32_t itemid = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
3730 if (itemid)
3731 {
3732 if (dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->getItemInterface()->GetItemCount(itemid, false) > 0)
3733 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
3734 else
3735 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
3736 }
3737 return 1;
3738}

3741{

3743 const uint32_t type = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
3744 if (ptr && visualId)
3745 {
3746 ptr->playSpellVisual(visualId, type);
3747 }
3748 return 1;
3749}

3751int LuaUnit::GetLevel(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3752{
3753 if (!ptr)
3754 return 0;
3755 lua_pushinteger(L, ptr->getLevel());
3756 return 1;
3757}
3758
3759int LuaUnit::SetLevel(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3760{
3761 if (!ptr)
3762 return 0;
3763 const uint32_t level = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
3764 if (level <= worldConfig.player.playerLevelCap && level > 0)
3765 {
3766 if (ptr->isPlayer())
3767 dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->applyLevelInfo(level);
3768 else
3769 ptr->setLevel(level);
3770 }
3771 return 0;
3772}
3773
3774int LuaUnit::AddSkill(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3775{
3776 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
3777 {
3778 return 0;
3779 }
3780
3781 const uint32_t skill = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
3782 const uint32_t current = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
3783 uint32_t max = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 3));
3784 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
3785 if (!max)
3786 max = 475;
3787 if (current > max)
3788 return 0;
3789 if (!plr->hasSkillLine(skill))
3790 plr->addSkillLine(skill, current, max);
3791 return 0;
3792}
3793
3794int LuaUnit::RemoveSkill(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3795{
3796 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
3797 {
3798 return 0;
3799 }
3800
3801 const uint32_t skill = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
3802 if (!skill)
3803 return 0;
3804 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
3805 plr->removeSkillLine(skill);
3806 return 0;
3807}

3813 return 0;
3814 }

3817 dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->m_cheats.hasFlyCheat = enabled;
3818 return 0;
3819}

3821int LuaUnit::AdvanceSkill(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3822{
3823 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
3824 {
3825 return 0;
3826 }
3827
3828 const uint32_t skill = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
3829 const uint32_t count = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
3830 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
3831 if (skill && count)
3832 {
3833 if (plr->hasSkillLine(skill))
3834 plr->advanceSkillLine(skill, count);
3835 }
3836 return 0;
3837}

3839int LuaUnit::RemoveAurasByMechanic(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)

3848 if (mechanic)

3850 return 0;

3865
3866int LuaUnit::AddAura(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3867{
3868 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
3869 {
3870 return 0;
3871 }
3872
3873 const uint32_t spellid = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
3874 const int32_t duration = static_cast<int32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
3875 const bool temp = CHECK_BOOL(L, 3);
3876 if (spellid)
3877 {
3878 auto aura = sSpellMgr.newAura(sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(spellid), duration, ptr, ptr, temp);
3879 ptr->addAura(std::move(aura));
3880 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
3881 }
3882 else
3883 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
3884 return 1;
3885}

3962
3963int LuaUnit::DealGoldCost(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
3964{
3965 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
3966 {
3967 return 0;
3968 }
3969
3970 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
3971 const uint32_t debt = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
3972
3973 if (!plr->hasEnoughCoinage(debt))
3974 {
3975 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
3976 }
3977 else
3978 {
3979 plr->modCoinage(-(int32_t)debt);
3980 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
3981 }
3982 return 1;
3983}

3993 dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->modCoinage(profit);
3994 return 0;
3995}

4000 return 0;

4003}
4004
4005int LuaUnit::Attack(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4006{
4007 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
4008 {
4009 return 0;
4010 }
4011 Unit* target = CHECK_UNIT(L, 1);
4012 if (target && ptr->getThreatManager().canHaveThreatList())
4013 {
4014 auto& threatManager = ptr->getThreatManager();
4015 if (threatManager.getCurrentVictim() == target)
4016 {
4017 // Unit is already attacking this target
4018 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
4019 return 1;
4020 }
4021
4022 if (!threatManager.isThreatListEmpty())
4023 {
4024 threatManager.addThreat(target, 20.0f);
4025 // Set threat equal to highest threat currently on target
4026 threatManager.matchUnitThreatToHighestThreat(target);
4027 }
4028
4029 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
4030 }
4031 else
4032 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
4033 return 1;
4034}
4035
4036int LuaUnit::CanUseCommand(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4037{
4038 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
4039 {
4040 return 0;
4041 }
4042
4043 const char cmdlevel = (char)luaL_checkstring(L, 1)[0];
4044 const Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
4045 if (plr->getSession()->CanUseCommand(cmdlevel))
4046 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
4047 else
4048 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
4049 return 1;
4050}
4051
4052int LuaUnit::GetSelection(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4053{
4054 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
4055 {
4056 return 0;
4057 }
4058
4059 const Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
4060 Unit* selection = plr->getWorldMap()->getUnit(plr->getTargetGuid());
4061 if (selection)
4062 PUSH_UNIT(L, selection);
4063 else
4064 lua_pushnil(L);
4065 return 1;
4066}
4067
4068int LuaUnit::GetSelectedGO(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4069{
4070 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
4071 {
4072 return 0;
4073 }

4076 PUSH_GO(L, plr->getSelectedGo());
4077 return 1;
4078}
4079
4080int LuaUnit::SetSelectedGO(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4081{
4082 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
4083 {
4084 return 0;
4085 }
4086
4087 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
4088 const GameObject* newsel = CHECK_GO(L, 1);
4089 if (!newsel)
4090 return 0;
4091 plr->setSelectedGo(newsel->getGuid());
4092 return 0;
4093}
4094
4095int LuaUnit::RepairAllPlayerItems(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4096{
4097 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
4098 {
4099 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
4100 return 1;
4101 }
4102 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
4103 Item* pItem = nullptr;
4104 Container* pContainer = nullptr;
4105 uint16_t j;
4106 uint16_t i;
4107
4108 for (i = 0; i < MAX_INVENTORY_SLOT; i++)
4109 {
4110 pItem = plr->getItemInterface()->GetInventoryItem(i);
4111 if (pItem != nullptr)
4112 {
4113 if (pItem->isContainer())
4114 {
4115 pContainer = dynamic_cast<Container*>(pItem);
4116 for (j = 0; j < pContainer->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots; ++j)
4117 {
4118 pItem = pContainer->getItem(j);
4119 if (pItem != nullptr)
4120 {
4121 pItem->setDurabilityToMax();
4122 }
4123 }
4124 }
4125 else
4126 {
4127 if (pItem->getItemProperties()->MaxDurability > 0 && i < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END && pItem->getDurability() <= 0)
4128 {
4129 pItem->setDurabilityToMax();
4130 plr->applyItemMods(pItem, i, true);
4131 }
4132 else
4133 {
4134 pItem->setDurabilityToMax();
4135 }
4136 }
4137 }
4138 }
4139 return 0;
4140}
4141
4142int LuaUnit::SetKnownTitle(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4143{
4144 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
4145 {
4146 return 0;
4147 }
4148
4149 int title = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
4150 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
4151 plr->setKnownPvPTitle(RankTitles(title), true);
4152 plr->saveToDB(false);
4153 return 0;
4154}
4155
4156int LuaUnit::UnsetKnownTitle(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4157{
4158 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
4159 {
4160 return 0;
4161 }
4162
4163 int title = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
4164 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
4165 plr->setKnownPvPTitle(RankTitles(title), false);
4166 plr->saveToDB(false);
4167 return 0;
4168}
4169
4170int LuaUnit::LifeTimeKills(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4171{
4172 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
4173 {
4174 return 0;
4175 }
4176
4177 const int kills = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
4178 const char* check = luaL_checklstring(L, 2, nullptr);
4179 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
4180 const int killscheck = plr->getLifetimeHonorableKills();
4181 if (check && strncmp(check, "add", 4) == 0 && kills > 0)
4182 {
4183 plr->setLifetimeHonorableKills(killscheck + kills);
4184 plr->saveToDB(false);
4185 return 0;
4186 }
4187 if (check && strncmp(check, "del", 4) == 0 && killscheck >= kills)
4188 {
4189 plr->setLifetimeHonorableKills(killscheck - kills);
4190 plr->saveToDB(false);
4191 return 0;
4192 }
4193 if (check && strncmp(check, "set", 4) == 0 && kills >= 0)
4194 {
4195 plr->setLifetimeHonorableKills(kills);
4196 plr->saveToDB(false);
4197 return 0;
4198 }
4199 if (check == nullptr || kills == 0)
4200 {
4201 lua_pushinteger(L, killscheck);
4202 return 1;
4203 }
4204 return 0;
4205}
4206
4207int LuaUnit::HasTitle(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4208{
4209 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
4210 {
4211 return 0;
4212 }
4213
4214 int title = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
4215 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
4216 if (plr->hasPvPTitle(RankTitles(title)))
4217 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
4218 else
4219 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
4220 return 1;
4221}
4222
4223int LuaUnit::GetMaxSkill(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4224{
4225 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
4226 {
4227 return 0;
4228 }
4229
4230 const uint32_t skill = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
4231 lua_pushinteger(L, dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->getSkillLineMax(skill));
4232 return 1;
4233}
4234
4235int LuaUnit::GetCurrentSkill(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4236{
4237 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
4238 {
4239 return 0;
4240 }
4241
4242 const uint32_t skill = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
4243 lua_pushinteger(L, dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->getSkillLineCurrent(skill));

4246
4247int LuaUnit::HasSkill(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4248{
4249 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
4250 {
4251 return 0;
4252 }
4253
4254 const uint32_t skill = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
4255 lua_pushboolean(L, (dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->hasSkillLine(skill)) ? 1 : 0);
4256 return 1;
4257}
4258
4259int LuaUnit::GetGuildName(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4260{
4261 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
4262 {
4263 return 0;
4264 }
4265
4266 const Guild* pGuild = sGuildMgr.getGuildById(dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->getGuildId());
4267 if (pGuild != nullptr)
4268 lua_pushstring(L, pGuild->getNameChar());
4269 else
4270 lua_pushnil(L);
4271 return 1;
4272}

4378 return 0;
4379 }

4382 if (quest_id && dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->hasQuestInQuestLog(quest_id))
4383 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
4384 else
4385 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
4386 return 1;
4387}
4388
4389int LuaUnit::CreatureHasQuest(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4390{
4391 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
4392 {
4393 return 0;
4394 }
4395 Creature* ctr = dynamic_cast<Creature*>(ptr);
4396 const uint32_t questid = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
4397 QuestProperties const* qst = sMySQLStore.getQuestProperties(questid);
4398 if (ctr->HasQuest(qst->id, qst->type))
4399 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
4400 else
4401 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
4402 return 1;
4403}

4414 plr->removePvpFlag();
4415 return 0;
4416}

4424}
4425
4426int LuaUnit::GossipMiscAction(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4427{
4428 if (ptr == nullptr)
4429 return 0;
4430
4431 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
4432 Creature* crc = dynamic_cast<Creature*>(CHECK_UNIT(L, 2));
4433 const uint32_t miscint = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 3));
4434 const uint32_t actionid = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
4435 if (!crc && actionid < 9)
4436 return 0;
4437 if (actionid == 1) plr->getSession()->sendInventoryList(crc);
4438 else if (actionid == 2) plr->getSession()->sendTrainerList(crc);
4439 else if (actionid == 3) plr->getSession()->sendInnkeeperBind(crc);
4440 else if (actionid == 4) plr->getSession()->sendBankerList(crc);
4441 else if (actionid == 5) plr->getSession()->sendBattlegroundList(crc, miscint);
4442 else if (actionid == 6) plr->getSession()->sendAuctionList(crc);
4443 else if (actionid == 7) plr->getSession()->sendTabardHelp(crc);
4444 else if (actionid == 8) plr->getSession()->sendSpiritHealerRequest(crc);
4445 else if (actionid == 9) plr->sendTalentResetConfirmPacket();
4446 else if (actionid == 10) plr->sendPetUnlearnConfirmPacket();
4447 return 0;
4448}
4449
4450int LuaUnit::SendVendorWindow(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4451{
4452 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
4453 {
4454 return 0;
4455 }
4456
4457 const Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
4458 Creature* object = dynamic_cast<Creature*>(CHECK_UNIT(L, 1)); // NOT entry. The unit pointer.
4459 if (object != nullptr)
4460 plr->getSession()->sendInventoryList(object);
4461 return 0;
4462}

4534
4535int LuaUnit::SendLootWindow(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4536{
4537 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
4538 {
4539 return 0;
4540 }
4541
4542 const uint64_t guid = CHECK_GUID(L, 1);
4543 const uint8_t loot_type = (uint8_t)luaL_checkinteger(L, 2);
4544 uint8_t loot_type2 = 1;
4545 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
4546 plr->setLootGuid(guid);
4547
4548 WoWGuid wowGuid;
4549 wowGuid.Init(guid);
4550
4551 if (wowGuid.isUnit())
4552 {
4553 Unit* pUnit = plr->getWorldMap()->getUnit(guid);
4554 CreatureProperties const* creature_properties = dynamic_cast<Creature*>(pUnit)->GetCreatureProperties();
4555 const auto lootType = pUnit->getWorldMap() ? (pUnit->getWorldMap()->getDifficulty() ? true : false) : false;
4556 switch (loot_type)
4557 {
4558 default:
4559 sLootMgr.fillCreatureLoot(plr, &pUnit->loot, pUnit->getEntry(), lootType);
4560 pUnit->loot.gold = creature_properties ? creature_properties->money : 0;
4561 loot_type2 = 1;
4562 break;
4563 case 2:
4564 sLootMgr.fillSkinningLoot(plr, &pUnit->loot, pUnit->getEntry(), lootType);
4565 loot_type2 = 2;
4566 break;
4567 case 3:
4568 sLootMgr.fillPickpocketingLoot(plr, &pUnit->loot, pUnit->getEntry(), lootType);
4569 loot_type2 = 2;
4570 break;
4571 }
4572 }
4573 else if (wowGuid.isGameObject())
4574 {
4575 GameObject* pGO = plr->getWorldMap()->getGameObject(wowGuid.getGuidLowPart());
4576 if (pGO != nullptr && pGO->IsLootable())
4577 {
4578 GameObject_Lootable* lt = dynamic_cast<GameObject_Lootable*>(pGO);
4579 const auto lootType = pGO->getWorldMap() ? (pGO->getWorldMap()->getDifficulty() ? true : false) : false;
4580 switch (loot_type)
4581 {
4582 default:
4583 sLootMgr.fillGOLoot(plr, &lt->loot, pGO->getEntry(), lootType);
4584 loot_type2 = 1;
4585 break;
4586 case 5:
4587 sLootMgr.fillSkinningLoot(plr, &lt->loot, pGO->getEntry(), lootType);
4588 loot_type2 = 2;
4589 break;
4590 }
4591 }
4592 }
4593 else if (wowGuid.isItem())
4594 {
4595 const Item* pItem = plr->getItemInterface()->GetItemByGUID(guid);
4596 switch (loot_type)
4597 {
4598 case 6:
4599 sLootMgr.fillItemLoot(plr, pItem->m_loot.get(), pItem->getEntry(), plr->getWorldMap() ? (plr->getWorldMap()->getDifficulty() ? true : false) : false);
4600 loot_type2 = 1;
4601 break;
4602 default:
4603 break;
4604 }
4605 }
4606 plr->sendLoot(guid, 2, plr->GetMapId());
4607 return 0;
4608}
4609
4610int LuaUnit::AddLoot(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4611{
4612 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
4613 {
4614 return 0;
4615 }
4616 if ((lua_gettop(L) != 3) || (lua_gettop(L) != 5))
4617 return 0;
4618
4619 const uint32_t itemid = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
4620 const uint32_t mincount = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
4621 const uint32_t maxcount = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 3));
4622 std::vector<float> ichance;
4623
4624 const float chance = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 5);
4625
4626 for (uint8_t i = 0; i == 3; i++)
4627 ichance.push_back(chance);
4628
4629 const bool perm = ((luaL_optinteger(L, 4, 0) == 1) ? true : false);
4630 if (perm)
4631 {
4632 const auto result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT * FROM loot_creatures WHERE entryid = %u, itemid = %u", ptr->getEntry(), itemid);
4633 if (!result)
4634 WorldDatabase.Execute("REPLACE INTO loot_creatures VALUES (%u, %u, %f, 0, 0, 0, %u, %u )", ptr->getEntry(), itemid, chance, mincount, maxcount);
4635 }
4636 sLootMgr.addLoot(&ptr->loot, itemid, ichance, mincount, maxcount, ptr->getWorldMap()->getDifficulty());
4637 return 0;
4638}
4639
4640int LuaUnit::VendorAddItem(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4641{
4642 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
4643 {
4644 return 0;
4645 }
4646 Creature* ctr = dynamic_cast<Creature*>(ptr);
4647 const uint32_t itemid = (uint32_t)luaL_checknumber(L, 1);
4648 const uint32_t amount = (uint32_t)luaL_checknumber(L, 2);
4649 const uint32_t costid = (uint32_t)luaL_checknumber(L, 3);
4650
4651 const auto item_extended_cost = (costid > 0) ? sItemExtendedCostStore.lookupEntry(costid) : nullptr;
4652 if (itemid && amount)
4653 ctr->AddVendorItem(itemid, amount, item_extended_cost);
4654
4655 return 0;
4656}
4657
4658int LuaUnit::VendorRemoveItem(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4659{
4660 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
4661 {
4662 return 0;
4663 }
4664 Creature* ctr = dynamic_cast<Creature*>(ptr);
4665 const uint32_t itemid = (uint32_t)luaL_checknumber(L, 1);
4666 const int slot = ctr->GetSlotByItemId(itemid);
4667 if (itemid && slot > 0)
4668 ctr->RemoveVendorItem(itemid);
4669 return 0;
4670}
4671
4672int LuaUnit::VendorRemoveAllItems(lua_State* /*L*/, Unit* ptr)
4673{
4674 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
4675 {
4676 return 0;
4677 }
4678 Creature* ctr = dynamic_cast<Creature*>(ptr);
4679 uint32_t i = 0;
4680 if (ctr->HasItems())
4681 {
4682 uint32_t creatureitemids[200];
4683 const size_t count = ctr->GetSellItemCount();
4684 for (std::vector<CreatureItem>::iterator itr = ctr->GetSellItemBegin(); itr != ctr->GetSellItemEnd(); ++itr)
4685 {
4686 creatureitemids[i] = itr->itemid;
4687 i += 1;
4688 }
4689 for (i = 0; i < count; i++)
4690 {
4691 ctr->RemoveVendorItem(creatureitemids[i]);
4692 }
4693 }
4694 return 0;
4695}
4696
4697int LuaUnit::EquipWeapons(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4698{
4699 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
4700 {
4701 return 0;
4702 }
4703 const uint32_t equip1 = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
4704 const uint32_t equip2 = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
4705 const uint32_t equip3 = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 3));
4706 ptr->setVirtualItemSlotId(MELEE, equip1);
4707 ptr->setVirtualItemSlotId(OFFHAND, equip2);
4708 ptr->setVirtualItemSlotId(RANGED, equip3);
4709 return 0;
4710}
4711
4712int LuaUnit::Dismount(lua_State* /*L*/, Unit* ptr)
4713{
4714 if (!ptr)
4715 return 0;
4716 if (ptr->isPlayer())
4717 {
4718 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
4719 plr->removeAllAurasById(plr->getMountSpellId());
4720 plr->setMountDisplayId(0);
4721 }
4722 else
4723 ptr->setMountDisplayId(0);
4724 return 0;
4725}

4736 pl->giveXp(exp, pl->getGuid(), true);
4737 return 0;
4738}

4797 return 1;

4799
4800int LuaUnit::SetPlayerLock(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4801{
4802 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
4803 {
4804 return 0;
4805 }
4806
4807 const bool lock = CHECK_BOOL(L, 1);
4808 if (lock)
4809 {
4810 ptr->m_pacified = 1;
4811 ptr->addUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_PACIFIED | UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED);
4812 dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->sendClientControlPacket(ptr, 0);
4813 }
4814 else
4815 {
4816 ptr->m_pacified = 0;
4817 ptr->removeUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_PACIFIED | UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED);
4818 dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->sendClientControlPacket(ptr, 1);
4819 }
4820 return 0;
4821}
4822
4823int LuaUnit::MovePlayerTo(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4824{
4825 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
4826 {
4827 return 0;
4828 }
4829
4830 const float x = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 1);
4831 const float y = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 2);
4832 const float z = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 3);
4833 const float o = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 4);
4834 const uint32_t mov_flag = CHECK_ULONG(L, 5); //0 - walk, 256 - teleport, 4096 - run, 12288 - fly
4835 float moveSpeed = (float)luaL_optnumber(L, 6, 1.0f);
4836 if (moveSpeed == 1.0f)
4837 {
4838 if (mov_flag == 0)
4839 moveSpeed = 2.5f * 0.001f;
4840 else
4841 moveSpeed = 7.0f * 0.001f;
4842 }
4843 ptr->setFacing(o);
4844 ptr->SetOrientation(o);
4845 const float distance = ptr->CalcDistance(ptr->GetPositionX(), ptr->GetPositionY(), ptr->GetPositionZ(), x, y, z);
4846 const uint32_t moveTime = uint32_t(distance / moveSpeed);
4847 WorldPacket data(SMSG_MONSTER_MOVE, 50);
4848 data << ptr->GetNewGUID();
4849 data << uint8_t(0);
4850 data << ptr->GetPositionX();
4851 data << ptr->GetPositionY();
4852 data << ptr->GetPositionZ();
4853 data << Util::getMSTime();
4854 data << uint8_t(0x00);
4855 data << uint32_t(mov_flag);
4856 data << moveTime;
4857 data << uint32_t(1);
4858 data << x << y << z;
4859
4860 ptr->sendMessageToSet(&data, true);
4861 ptr->SetPosition(x, y, z, o);
4862 return 0;
4863}
4864
4865int LuaUnit::ChannelSpell(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4866{
4867 const uint32_t Csp = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
4868 const Object* target = CHECK_OBJECT(L, 2);
4869 if (Csp && target != nullptr)
4870 {
4871 ptr->castSpell(target->getGuid(), sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(Csp), false);
4872 ptr->setChannelObjectGuid(target->getGuid());
4873 ptr->setChannelSpellId(Csp);
4874 }
4875 return 0;
4876}
4877
4878int LuaUnit::StopChannel(lua_State* /*L*/, Unit* ptr)
4879{
4880 if (ptr == nullptr)
4881 return 0;
4882 ptr->setChannelObjectGuid(0);
4883 ptr->setChannelSpellId(0);
4884 return 0;
4885}
4886
4887//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
4888// WORLDSTATES/WORLD PVP NOT SUPPORTED
4889
4890/*
4891int LuaUnit::SetWorldState(lua_State * L, Unit * ptr)
4892{
4893 int zone = luaL_checkinteger(L, 1);
4894 int index = luaL_checkinteger(L, 2);
4895 int value = luaL_checkinteger(L, 3);
4896
4897 if(!zone || !index || !value)
4898 lua_pushnil(L);
4899
4900 ptr->getWorldMap()->SetWorldState(zone, index, value);
4901 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
4902 return 1;
4903}
4904*/
4905
4906int LuaUnit::EnableFlight(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4907{
4908 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
4909 {
4910 return 0;
4911 }
4912
4913 const bool enable_fly = CHECK_BOOL(L, 1);
4914 ptr->setMoveCanFly(enable_fly);
4915 return 0;
4916}

4922 return 0;

4941
4942int LuaUnit::IsMounted(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4943{
4944 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
4945 {
4946 return 0;
4947 }
4948
4949 if (ptr->isPlayer())
4950 {
4951 const Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
4952 if (plr->isMounted())
4953 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
4954 else
4955 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
4956 }
4957 else
4958 lua_pushboolean(L, (ptr->getMountDisplayId() > 0) ? 1 : 0);
4959 return 1;
4960}

4962// credits to alvanaar for the following 9 functions:
4963int LuaUnit::IsGroupedWith(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4964{
4965 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
4966 {
4967 return 0;
4968 }
4969
4970 Player* target = CHECK_PLAYER(L, 1);
4971 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
4972 if (plr->getGroup() && plr->getGroup()->HasMember(target))
4973 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
4974 else
4975 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
4976 return 1;
4977}
4978
4979int LuaUnit::GetGroupType(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
4980{
4981 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
4982 return 0;
4983
4984 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
4985 if (const auto group = plr->getGroup())
4986 lua_pushinteger(L, group->getGroupType());
4987 else
4988 lua_pushnil(L);
4989 return 1;
4990}

5040 return 0;
5041 }
5042

5044 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
5045 if (pnts > 0)
5046 {
5047 plr->addArenaPoints(pnts, true);
5048 }
5049 return 0;
5050}

5098
5099int LuaUnit::SendPacketToGuild(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5100{
5101 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5102 {
5103 return 0;
5104 }
5105
5106 WorldPacket* data = CHECK_PACKET(L, 1);
5107 const Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
5108 const Guild* guild = nullptr;
5109 if (luaL_optinteger(L, 2, -1) > 0)
5110 {
5111 guild = sGuildMgr.getGuildById(static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_optinteger(L, 2, 0)));
5112 }
5113 else
5114 {
5115 guild = plr->getGuild();
5116 }
5117 if (data != nullptr && guild != nullptr)
5118 guild->sendPacket(data);
5119 return 0;
5120}

5127 }
5128
5129 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
5130 if (plr->isInGuild())
5131 lua_pushinteger(L, plr->getGuildId());
5132 else
5133 lua_pushnil(L);
5134 return 1;
5135}

5241{

5243 {
5244 return 0;
5245 }
5246
5247 const Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
5248 const Guild* guild = nullptr;
5249 if (luaL_optinteger(L, 1, -1) >= 0)
5250 guild = sGuildMgr.getGuildById(static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_optinteger(L, 1, -1)));
5251 else
5252 guild = plr->getGuild();
5253
5254 if (guild != nullptr)
5255 lua_pushstring(L, guild->getMOTDChar());
5256 else
5257 lua_pushnil(L);
5258 return 1;

5275int LuaUnit::AddGuildMember(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5276{
5277 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5278 {
5279 return 0;
5280 }
5281
5282 const Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
5283 const uint32_t g_id = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
5284 const uint8_t rank = static_cast<uint8_t>(luaL_optinteger(L, 2, -1));
5285 Guild* target = sGuildMgr.getGuildById(g_id);
5286 if (target)
5287 target->addMember(plr->getGuid(), rank);
5288 return 0;
5289}

5341 {
5342 return 0;

5349 else
5350 guild = plr->getGuild();

5352 guild->disband();
5353
5354 return 0;

5475
5476int LuaUnit::GetGuildLeader(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5477{
5478 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5479 {
5480 return 0;
5481 }
5482
5483 const Guild* pGuild = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->getGuild();
5484 if (pGuild != nullptr)
5485 {
5486 const Player* plr = sObjectMgr.getPlayer(uint32_t(pGuild->getLeaderGUID()));
5487 if (plr != nullptr)
5488 lua_pushstring(L, plr->getName().c_str());
5489 else
5490 lua_pushnil(L);
5491 }
5492 else
5493 lua_pushnil(L);
5494
5495 return 1;
5496}
5497

5499{
5500 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5501 {
5502 return 0;
5503 }
5504
5505 const Guild* pGuild = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->getGuild();
5506 (pGuild != nullptr) ? lua_pushinteger(L, pGuild->getMembersCount()) : lua_pushnil(L);
5507
5508 return 1;
5509}
5510
5511int LuaUnit::IsFriendly(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5512{
5513 Unit* obj = CHECK_UNIT(L, 1);
5514 if (!obj || !ptr)
5515 return 0;
5516 if (ptr->isFriendlyTo(obj))
5517 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
5518 else
5519 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
5520 return 1;
5521}
5522
5523int LuaUnit::IsInChannel(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5524{
5525 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5526 {
5527 return 0;
5528 }
5529
5530 const char* channelName = luaL_checkstring(L, 1);
5531 if (!channelName)
5532 return 0;
5533
5534 const auto* channel = sChannelMgr.getChannel(channelName, dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr));
5535 // Channels: "General", "Trade", "LocalDefense", "GuildRecruitment", "LookingForGroup", (or any custom channel)
5536 if (channel->hasMember(dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)))
5537 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
5538 else
5539 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
5540
5541 return 1;
5542}
5543
5544int LuaUnit::JoinChannel(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5545{
5546 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5547 {
5548 return 0;
5549 }
5550
5551 const char* channelName = luaL_checkstring(L, 1);
5552 auto* const channel = sChannelMgr.getChannel(channelName, dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr));
5553 if (!channel)
5554 return 0;
5555
5556 const char* password = luaL_optstring(L, 2, channel->getChannelPassword().c_str());
5557
5558 if (channel->hasMember(dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)))
5559 return 0;
5560
5561 channel->attemptJoin(dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr), password);
5562
5563 return 1;
5564}
5565
5566int LuaUnit::LeaveChannel(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5567{
5568 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5569 {
5570 return 0;
5571 }
5572
5573 const char* channelName = luaL_checkstring(L, 1);
5574 auto* const channel = sChannelMgr.getChannel(channelName, dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr));
5575 if (!channelName || !channel || !channel->hasMember(dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)))
5576 return 0;
5577
5578 channel->leaveChannel(dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr), true);
5579
5580 return 1;
5581}
5582
5583int LuaUnit::SetChannelName(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5584{
5585 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5586 {
5587 return 0;
5588 }
5589
5590 const char* currentName = luaL_checkstring(L, 1);
5591 const char* newName = luaL_checkstring(L, 2);
5592 auto* const channel = sChannelMgr.getChannel(currentName, dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr));
5593 if (!currentName || !newName || !channel || channel->getChannelName() == newName)
5594 return 0;
5595
5596 channel->setChannelName(newName);
5597 return 1;
5598}
5599
5600int LuaUnit::SetChannelPassword(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5601{
5602 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5603 {
5604 return 0;
5605 }
5606
5607 const char* channelName = luaL_checkstring(L, 1);
5608 const char* password = luaL_checkstring(L, 2);
5609 auto* const channel = sChannelMgr.getChannel(channelName, dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr));
5610 if (!password || !channel || channel->getChannelPassword() == password)
5611 return 0;
5612
5613 channel->setPassword(dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr), password);
5614 return 1;
5615}
5616
5617int LuaUnit::GetChannelPassword(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5618{
5619 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5620 {
5621 return 0;
5622 }
5623
5624 const char* channelName = luaL_checkstring(L, 1);
5625 const auto* channel = sChannelMgr.getChannel(channelName, dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr));
5626 if (!channel)
5627 return 0;
5628
5629 lua_pushstring(L, channel->getChannelPassword().c_str());
5630
5631 return 1;
5632}
5633
5634int LuaUnit::KickFromChannel(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5635{
5636 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5637 {
5638 return 0;
5639 }
5640
5641 const char* channelName = luaL_checkstring(L, 1);
5642 Player* player = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
5643 auto* const channel = sChannelMgr.getChannel(channelName, player);
5644 if (!channel)
5645 return 0;
5646
5647 channel->kickOrBanPlayer(player, player, false);
5648 return 1;
5649}
5650
5651int LuaUnit::BanFromChannel(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5652{
5653 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5654 {
5655 return 0;
5656 }
5657
5658 const char* channelName = luaL_checkstring(L, 1);
5659 Player* player = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
5660 auto* const channel = sChannelMgr.getChannel(channelName, player);
5661 if (!channel)
5662 return 0;
5663
5664 channel->kickOrBanPlayer(player, player, true);
5665 return 1;
5666}
5667
5668int LuaUnit::UnbanFromChannel(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5669{
5670 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5671 {
5672 return 0;
5673 }
5674
5675 const char* channelName = luaL_checkstring(L, 1);
5676 Player* player = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
5677 auto* const channel = sChannelMgr.getChannel(channelName, player);
5678 if (!channel)
5679 return 0;
5680
5681 channel->unBanPlayer(player, player->getPlayerInfo());
5682 return 1;
5683}
5684
5685int LuaUnit::GetChannelMemberCount(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5686{
5687 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5688 {
5689 return 0;
5690 }
5691
5692 const char* channelName = luaL_checkstring(L, 1);
5693 if (!channelName)
5694 return 0;
5695
5696 lua_pushnumber(L, static_cast<lua_Number>(sChannelMgr.getChannel(channelName, dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr))->getMemberCount()));
5697 return 1;
5698}
5699
5700int LuaUnit::GetPlayerMovementVector(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5701{
5702 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5703 {
5704 return 0;
5705 }
5706
5707 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
5708 const MovementInfo* movement_info = plr->getMovementInfo();
5709 if (movement_info != nullptr)
5710 {
5711 lua_newtable(L);
5712
5713 lua_pushstring(L, "x");
5714 lua_pushnumber(L, movement_info->getPosition()->x);
5715 lua_rawset(L, -3);
5716 lua_pushstring(L, "y");
5717 lua_pushnumber(L, movement_info->getPosition()->y);
5718 lua_rawset(L, -3);
5719 lua_pushstring(L, "z");
5720 lua_pushnumber(L, movement_info->getPosition()->z);
5721 lua_rawset(L, -3);
5722 lua_pushstring(L, "o");
5723 lua_pushnumber(L, movement_info->getPosition()->o);
5724 lua_rawset(L, -3);
5725 }
5726 else
5727 lua_pushnil(L);
5728 return 1;
5729}
5730
5731int LuaUnit::GetPlayerMovementFlags(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5732{
5733 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5734 return 0;
5735
5736 const MovementInfo* move_info = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->getMovementInfo();
5737 if (move_info != nullptr)
5738 lua_pushnumber(L, move_info->flags);
5739 else
5740 lua_pushnil(L);
5741
5742 return 1;
5743}
5744
5745int LuaUnit::Repop(lua_State* /*L*/, Unit* ptr)
5746{
5747 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5748 {
5749 return 0;
5750 }
5751
5752 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
5753 if (plr->isDead())
5754 plr->repopRequest();
5755 return 0;
5756}
5757
5758int LuaUnit::SetMovementFlags(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5759{
5760 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
5761 {
5762 return 0;
5763 }
5764 const int movetype = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1)); //0: walk, 1: run, 2: fly.
5765 if (movetype == 2)
5766 {
5767 ptr->setMoveCanFly(ptr->IsFlying());
5768 }
5769 else if (movetype == 1)
5770 {
5771 ptr->setMoveWalk(false);
5772 }
5773 else
5774 {
5775 ptr->setMoveWalk(true);
5776 }
5777 return 0;
5778}
5779
5780int LuaUnit::GetSpawnId(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5781{
5782 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
5783 {
5784 return 0;
5785 }
5786 Creature* cre = dynamic_cast<Creature*>(ptr);
5787 lua_pushnumber(L, cre->GetSQL_id());
5788 return 1;
5789}
5790
5791int LuaUnit::ResetTalents(lua_State* /*L*/, Unit* ptr)
5792{
5793 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5794 {
5795 return 0;
5796 }
5797
5798 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
5799 plr->resetTalents();
5800 return 0;
5801}
5802
5803int LuaUnit::SetTalentPoints(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5804{
5805 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5806 {
5807 return 0;
5808 }
5809
5810 const auto forBothSpecs = CHECK_BOOL(L, 1);
5811 const auto points = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
5812 dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->setTalentPoints(points, forBothSpecs);
5813 return 0;
5814}
5815
5816int LuaUnit::GetTalentPoints(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5817{
5818 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5819 {
5820 return 0;
5821 }
5822
5823 const uint32_t spec = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1)); //0 or 1
5824#ifdef FT_DUAL_SPEC
5825 PlayerSpec plrSpec = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->m_specs[spec];
5826#else
5827 PlayerSpec plrSpec = static_cast<Player*>(ptr)->m_spec;
5828#endif
5829 //uint32_t Lvl = static_cast<Player*>(ptr)->getLevel();
5830 const uint32_t FreePoints = plrSpec.getTalentPoints();
5831
5832 lua_pushnumber(L, FreePoints);
5833 return 1;
5834}
5835
5836int LuaUnit::EventChat(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5837{
5838 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
5839 {
5840 return 0;
5841 }
5842 const uint8_t typ = static_cast<uint8_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
5843 const uint32_t lang = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
5844 const char* message = luaL_checkstring(L, 3);
5845 const uint32_t delay = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 4));
5846 if (message != nullptr && delay)
5847 ptr->sendChatMessage(typ, lang, message, delay);
5848 return 0;
5849}
5850
5851int LuaUnit::GetEquippedItemBySlot(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5852{
5853 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5854 {
5855 return 0;
5856 }
5857
5858 const int16_t slot = static_cast<int16_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
5859 const Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
5860 Item* pItem = plr->getItemInterface()->GetInventoryItem(slot);
5861 if (pItem)
5862 PUSH_ITEM(L, pItem);
5863 else
5864 lua_pushnil(L);
5865 return 1;
5866}
5867
5868int LuaUnit::GetGuildMembers(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5869{
5870 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5871 {
5872 return 0;
5873 }
5874
5875 const Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
5876 const Guild* pGuild = plr->getGuild();
5877 uint32_t count = 0;
5878 lua_newtable(L);
5879 if (pGuild != nullptr)
5880 {
5881 for (const auto& member : pGuild->getMemberNameList())
5882 {
5883 count++;
5884 lua_pushinteger(L, count);
5885 //Paroxysm : Why do we push player names are opposed to objects?
5886 //hyper: because guild members might not be logged in
5887 //ret = (*itr).first->m_loggedInPlayer;
5888 //PUSH_UNIT(L, ((Unit*)ret), false);
5889 lua_pushstring(L, member.c_str());
5890 lua_rawset(L, -3);
5891 }
5892 }
5893 else
5894 lua_pushnil(L);
5895
5896 return 1;
5897}
5898
5899int LuaUnit::AddAchievement(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5900{
5901 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5902 {
5903 return 0;
5904 }
5905
5906#if VERSION_STRING > TBC
5907 const int32_t achievementID = static_cast<int32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
5908 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
5909 if (plr->getAchievementMgr()->gmCompleteAchievement(nullptr, achievementID))
5910 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
5911 else
5912 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
5913#endif
5914 return 1;
5915}
5916
5917int LuaUnit::RemoveAchievement(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5918{
5919 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5920 {
5921 return 0;
5922 }
5923
5924#if VERSION_STRING > TBC
5925 const int32_t achievementID = static_cast<int32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
5926 dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->getAchievementMgr()->gmResetAchievement(achievementID);
5927#endif
5928 return 0;
5929}
5930
5931int LuaUnit::HasAchievement(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5932{
5933 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5934 {
5935 return 0;
5936 }
5937
5938#if VERSION_STRING > TBC
5939 const uint32_t achievementID = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
5940 lua_pushboolean(L, dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->getAchievementMgr()->hasCompleted(achievementID) ? 1 : 0);
5941#endif
5942 return 1;
5943}
5944
5945int LuaUnit::GetAreaId(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5946{
5947 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
5948 {
5949 lua_pushboolean(L, 0); return 1;
5950 }
5951 const auto area = ptr->GetArea();
5952 RET_NUMBER(area ? area->id : -1);
5953}
5954
5955int LuaUnit::ResetPetTalents(lua_State* /*L*/, Unit* ptr)
5956{
5957 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
5958 {
5959 return 0;
5960 }
5961
5962 Pet* pet = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->getPet();
5963 if (pet != nullptr)
5964 {
5965 pet->WipeTalents();
5966#if VERSION_STRING == WotLK || VERSION_STRING == Cata
5967 pet->setPetTalentPoints(pet->getTotalTalentPoints());
5968 pet->SendTalentsToOwner();
5969#endif
5970 }
5971 return 0;
5972}
5973

5975{
5976 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
5977 {
5978 lua_pushboolean(L, 0); return 1;
5979 }
5980 lua_pushboolean(L, (ptr->isDazed()) ? 1 : 0);
5981 return 1;
5982}
5983

5985{
5986 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
5987 {
5988 lua_pushboolean(L, 0); return 1;
5989 }
5990 if (ptr->isRooted())
5991 RET_BOOL(true)
5992 RET_BOOL(false)
5993}
5994
5995int LuaUnit::HasAuraWithMechanic(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
5996{
5997 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
5998 {
5999 lua_pushboolean(L, 0); return 1;
6000 }
6001 const auto mechanic = static_cast<SpellMechanic>(CHECK_ULONG(L, 1));
6002 if (mechanic && ptr->hasAuraWithMechanic(mechanic))
6003 RET_BOOL(true)
6004 RET_BOOL(false)
6005}
6006
6007int LuaUnit::HasNegativeAura(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6008{
6009 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6010 {
6011 lua_pushboolean(L, 0); return 1;
6012 }
6013 for (uint16_t x = AuraSlots::NEGATIVE_SLOT_START; x < AuraSlots::NEGATIVE_SLOT_END; ++x)
6014 {
6015 if (ptr->getAuraWithAuraSlot(x))
6016 RET_BOOL(true)
6017 }
6018 RET_BOOL(false)
6019}
6020
6021int LuaUnit::HasPositiveAura(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6022{
6023 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6024 {
6025 return 0;
6026 }
6027
6028 for (uint16_t x = AuraSlots::POSITIVE_SLOT_START; x < AuraSlots::POSITIVE_SLOT_END; ++x)
6029 {
6030 if (ptr->getAuraWithAuraSlot(x))
6031 RET_BOOL(true)
6032 }
6033 RET_BOOL(false)
6034}
6035
6036int LuaUnit::GetClosestEnemy(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6037{
6038 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6039 {
6040 return 0;
6041 }
6042
6043 float closest_dist = 99999.99f;
6044 float current_dist = 0;
6045 Unit* ret = nullptr;
6046 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangeObjectsSet())
6047 {
6048 if (!itr || !itr->isCreatureOrPlayer() || !ptr->isHostileTo(itr))
6049 continue;
6050
6051 current_dist = ptr->GetDistance2dSq(itr);
6052 if (current_dist < closest_dist)
6053 {
6054 closest_dist = current_dist;
6055 ret = dynamic_cast<Unit*>(itr);
6056 }
6057 }
6058 PUSH_UNIT(L, ret);
6059 return 1;
6060}
6061
6062int LuaUnit::GetClosestFriend(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6063{
6064 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6065 {
6066 return 0;
6067 }
6068
6069 float closest_dist = 99999.99f;
6070 float current_dist = 0.0f;
6071 Unit* ret = nullptr;
6072 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangeObjectsSet())
6073 {
6074 if (!itr || !itr->isCreatureOrPlayer() || itr->isHostileTo(ptr))
6075 continue;
6076
6077 current_dist = itr->getDistanceSq(ptr);
6078 if (current_dist < closest_dist)
6079 {
6080 closest_dist = current_dist;
6081 ret = dynamic_cast<Unit*>(itr);
6082 }
6083 }
6084 PUSH_UNIT(L, ret);
6085 return 1;
6086}
6087
6088int LuaUnit::GetClosestUnit(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6089{
6090 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6091 {
6092 return 0;
6093 }
6094
6095 float closest_dist = 99999.99f;
6096 float current_dist = 0;
6097 Unit* ret = nullptr;
6098 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangeObjectsSet())
6099 {
6100 if (!itr || !itr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6101 continue;
6102
6103 current_dist = ptr->GetDistance2dSq(itr);
6104 if (current_dist < closest_dist)
6105 {
6106 closest_dist = current_dist;
6107 ret = dynamic_cast<Unit*>(itr);
6108 }
6109 }
6110 PUSH_UNIT(L, ret);
6111 return 1;
6112}
6113
6114int LuaUnit::GetObjectType(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6115{
6116 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6117 {
6118 return 0;
6119 }
6120
6121 if (ptr->isPlayer())
6122 lua_pushstring(L, "Player");
6123 else
6124 lua_pushstring(L, "Unit");
6125 return 1;
6126}
6127

6133 }
6134 const bool disable = CHECK_BOOL(L, 1);
6135 dynamic_cast<Creature*>(ptr)->getAIInterface()->setMeleeDisabled(disable);
6136 RET_BOOL(true)
6137}

6186 RET_BOOL(true)

6197 lua_pushnumber(L, ptr->GetPositionY());
6198 lua_pushnumber(L, ptr->GetPositionZ());
6199 lua_pushnumber(L, ptr->GetOrientation());
6200 return 4;
6201}

6204{
6205 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6206 {
6207 return 0;
6208 }
6209
6210 /*uint16_t index = static_cast<uint16_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
6211 uint8_t index2 = static_cast<uint8_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
6212 uint8_t value = ptr->getByteValue(index, index2);
6213 RET_INT(value);*/
6214 RET_INT(0)
6215}

6217int LuaUnit::SetByte(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6218{
6219 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6220 {
6221 lua_pushboolean(L, 0); return 1;
6222 }
6223 /*uint16_t index = static_cast<uint16_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
6224 uint8_t index2 = static_cast<uint8_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
6225 uint8_t value = static_cast<uint8_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 3));
6226 ptr->setByteValue(index, index2, value);*/
6227 RET_BOOL(true)
6228}
6229
6230int LuaUnit::GetSpawnLocation(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6231{
6232 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
6233 {
6234 return 0;
6235 }
6236 lua_pushnumber(L, ptr->GetSpawnX());
6237 lua_pushnumber(L, ptr->GetSpawnY());
6238 lua_pushnumber(L, ptr->GetSpawnZ());
6239 lua_pushnumber(L, ptr->GetSpawnO());
6240 return 4;
6241}
6242
6243int LuaUnit::GetObjectByGuid(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6244{
6245 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
6246 {
6247 return 0;
6248 }
6249 const uint64_t guid = CHECK_GUID(L, 1);
6250 Object* obj = ptr->getWorldMap()->getObject(guid);
6251 if (obj != nullptr && obj->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6252 PUSH_UNIT(L, obj);
6253 else if (obj != nullptr && obj->isGameObject())
6254 PUSH_GO(L, obj);
6255 else
6256 lua_pushnil(L);
6257 return 1;
6258}
6259
6260int LuaUnit::GetSecondHated(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6261{
6262 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
6263 {
6264 return 0;
6265 }
6266 PUSH_UNIT(L, ptr->getThreatManager().getSecondMostHated());
6267 return 1;
6268}
6269
6270int LuaUnit::UseAI(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6271{
6272 const bool check = CHECK_BOOL(L, 1);
6273 ptr->setAItoUse(check);
6274 return 0;
6275}
6276
6277int LuaUnit::FlagFFA(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6278{
6279 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6280 {
6281 return 0;
6282 }
6283
6284 const bool set = CHECK_BOOL(L, 1);
6285 if (set)
6286 ptr->setFfaPvpFlag();
6287 else
6288 ptr->removeFfaPvpFlag();
6289 return 0;
6290}
6291
6292int LuaUnit::TeleportCreature(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6293{
6294 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
6295 {
6296 return 0;
6297 }
6298 const float x = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 1);
6299 const float y = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 2);
6300 const float z = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 3);
6301 ptr->SetPosition(x, y, z, ptr->GetOrientation());
6302 WorldPacket data(SMSG_MONSTER_MOVE, 50);
6303 data << ptr->GetNewGUID();
6304 data << uint8_t(0);
6305 data << ptr->GetPositionX();
6306 data << ptr->GetPositionY();
6307 data << ptr->GetPositionZ();
6308 data << Util::getMSTime();
6309 data << uint8_t(0x0);
6310 data << uint32_t(0x100);
6311 data << uint32_t(1);
6312 data << uint32_t(1);
6313 data << x;
6314 data << y;
6315 data << z;
6316 ptr->sendMessageToSet(&data, false);
6317 return 0;
6318}
6319
6320int LuaUnit::IsInDungeon(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6321{
6322 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6323 {
6324 lua_pushboolean(L, 0); return 1;
6325 }
6326 if (ptr->getWorldMap()->getBaseMap()->getMapInfo() && ptr->getWorldMap()->getBaseMap()->getMapInfo()->isMultimodeDungeon())
6327 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
6328 else
6329 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
6330 return 1;
6331}
6332
6333int LuaUnit::IsInRaid(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6334{
6335 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6336 {
6337 lua_pushboolean(L, 0); return 1;
6338 }
6339 if (ptr->getWorldMap()->getBaseMap()->getMapInfo() && ptr->getWorldMap()->getBaseMap()->getMapInfo()->isRaid())
6340 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
6341 else
6342 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
6343 return 1;
6344}
6345
6346int LuaUnit::IsHostile(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6347{
6348 Object* B = CHECK_OBJECT(L, 1);
6349 lua_pushboolean(L, ptr->isHostileTo(B));
6350 return 1;
6351}
6352
6353int LuaUnit::IsAttackable(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6354{
6355 Object* B = CHECK_OBJECT(L, 1);
6356 lua_pushboolean(L, ptr->isValidTarget(B));
6357 return 1;
6358}
6359
6360int LuaUnit::GetQuestLogSlot(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6361{
6362 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
6363 {
6364 return 0;
6365 }
6366
6367 const uint32_t entry = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
6368
6369 if (const auto* questLog = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->getQuestLogByQuestId(entry))
6370 lua_pushnumber(L, questLog->getSlot());
6371 else
6372 RET_NUMBER(-1);
6373
6374 return 1;
6375}

6380 {
6381 lua_pushboolean(L, 0); return 1;
6382 }
6383 const uint32_t id = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
6384 RET_NUMBER(ptr->getAuraCountForId(id));
6385}

6423 return 0;

6425
6426int LuaUnit::GetQuestObjectiveCompletion(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6427{
6428 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
6429 {
6430 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
6431 return 1;
6432 }
6433 const uint32_t questid = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
6434 const uint8_t objective = static_cast<uint8_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
6435 const Player* player = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
6436
6437 if (const auto* questLog = player->getQuestLogByQuestId(questid))
6438 lua_pushnumber(L, questLog->getMobCountByIndex(objective));
6439 else
6440 lua_pushnil(L);
6441 return 1;
6442}
6443
6444int LuaUnit::IsOnVehicle(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6445{
6446#ifdef FT_VEHICLES
6447 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6448 {
6449 return 0;
6450 }
6451
6452 if ((ptr->getVehicleKit() != nullptr) || (ptr->isPlayer() && ptr->isVehicle()))
6453 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
6454 else
6455 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
6456#endif
6457 return 1;
6458}
6459
6460int LuaUnit::SpawnAndEnterVehicle(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6461{
6462#ifdef FT_VEHICLES
6463 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6464 {
6465 return 0;
6466 }
6467
6468 uint32_t creature_entry = 0;
6469 uint32_t delay = 0;
6470
6471 if (lua_gettop(L) != 2)
6472 return 0;
6473
6474 creature_entry = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
6475 delay = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
6476
6477 if (delay < 1 * 1000)
6478 delay = 1 * 1000;
6479
6480 if (creature_entry == 0)
6481 return 0;
6482
6483 if ((ptr->getVehicleKit() != nullptr) && (!ptr->isPlayer() || !ptr->isVehicle()))
6484 return 0;
6485
6486 CreatureProperties const* cp = sMySQLStore.getCreatureProperties(creature_entry);
6487 if (cp == nullptr)
6488 return 0;
6489
6490 const Player* p = nullptr;
6491 if (ptr->isPlayer())
6492 p = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
6493
6494 if ((cp->vehicleid == 0) && (p == nullptr) && (!p->getSession()->HasGMPermissions()))
6495 return 0;
6496
6497 const LocationVector v(ptr->GetPosition());
6498
6499 Creature* c = ptr->getWorldMap()->createCreature(cp->Id);
6500 c->Load(cp, v.x, v.y, v.z, v.o);
6501 c->removeNpcFlags(UNIT_NPC_FLAG_SPELLCLICK);
6502 c->PushToWorld(ptr->getWorldMap());
6503 c->callEnterVehicle(ptr);
6504#endif
6505 return 0;
6506}
6507
6508int LuaUnit::DismissVehicle(lua_State* /*L*/, Unit* ptr)
6509{
6510#ifdef FT_VEHICLES
6511 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6512 {
6513 return 0;
6514 }
6515
6516 Vehicle* v = nullptr;
6517 if (ptr->getVehicleKit() != nullptr)
6518 {
6519 v = ptr->getVehicleKit();
6520 }
6521 else
6522 {
6523 if (ptr->isPlayer() && (ptr->getVehicle() != nullptr))
6524 v = ptr->getVehicle();
6525 }
6526
6527 if (v == nullptr)
6528 return 0;
6529
6530 v->removeAllPassengers();
6531
6532 Unit* o = v->getBase();
6533
6534 if (o->isPlayer())
6535 o->removeAllAurasByAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_MOUNTED);
6536 else
6537 o->Delete();
6538#endif
6539 return 0;
6540}
6541
6542int LuaUnit::AddVehiclePassenger(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6543{
6544#ifdef FT_VEHICLES
6545 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6546 {
6547 return 0;
6548 }
6549
6550 const Vehicle* v = nullptr;
6551
6552 if (ptr->getVehicleKit() != nullptr)
6553 v = ptr->getVehicleKit();
6554 else
6555 if (ptr->isPlayer() && (ptr->getVehicle() != nullptr))
6556 v = ptr->getVehicle();
6557
6558 if (v == nullptr)
6559 return 0;
6560
6561 if (!v->hasEmptySeat())
6562 return 0;
6563
6564 if (lua_gettop(L) != 1)
6565 return 0;
6566
6567 const uint32_t creature_entry = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
6568
6569 CreatureProperties const* cp = sMySQLStore.getCreatureProperties(creature_entry);
6570 if (cp == nullptr)
6571 return 0;
6572
6573 Unit* u = v->getBase();
6574
6575 Creature* c = u->getWorldMap()->createCreature(creature_entry);
6576 c->Load(cp, u->GetPositionX(), u->GetPositionY(), u->GetPositionZ(), u->GetOrientation());
6577 c->PushToWorld(u->getWorldMap());
6578 c->callEnterVehicle(u);
6579#endif
6580 return 0;
6581}
6582
6583int LuaUnit::HasEmptyVehicleSeat(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6584{
6585#ifdef FT_VEHICLES
6586 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6587 {
6588 return 0;
6589 }
6590
6591 const Vehicle* v = nullptr;
6592
6593 if (ptr->getVehicleKit() != nullptr)
6594 v = ptr->getVehicleKit();
6595 else
6596 if (ptr->isPlayer() && (ptr->getVehicle() != nullptr))
6597 v = ptr->getVehicle();
6598
6599 if (v == nullptr)
6600 return 0;
6601
6602 if (v->hasEmptySeat())
6603 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
6604 else
6605 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
6606#endif
6607 return 1;
6608}
6609
6610int LuaUnit::EnterVehicle(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6611{
6612#ifdef FT_VEHICLES
6613 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6614 {
6615 return 0;
6616 }
6617
6618 if (lua_gettop(L) != 2)
6619 return 0;
6620
6621 const uint64_t guid = CHECK_GUID(L, 1);
6622
6623 Unit* _unit = ptr->getWorldMapUnit(guid);
6624 if (_unit)
6625 _unit->callEnterVehicle(ptr);
6626#endif
6627 return 0;
6628}
6629
6630int LuaUnit::ExitVehicle(lua_State* /*L*/, Unit* ptr)
6631{
6632#ifdef FT_VEHICLES
6633 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6634 {
6635 return 0;
6636 }
6637
6638 if (ptr->getVehicleKit() != nullptr)
6639 {
6640 ptr->callExitVehicle();
6641 }
6642 else
6643 {
6644 if (ptr->isPlayer() && ptr->getVehicle() != nullptr)
6645 ptr->removeAllAurasByAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_MOUNTED);
6646 }
6647#endif
6648 return 0;
6649}
6650
6651int LuaUnit::GetVehicleBase(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6652{
6653#ifdef FT_VEHICLES
6654 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6655 {
6656 return 0;
6657 }
6658
6659 Unit* u = ptr->getVehicleBase();
6660
6661 if (u != nullptr)
6662 PUSH_UNIT(L, u);
6663 else
6664 lua_pushnil(L);
6665#endif
6666 return 1;
6667}
6668
6669int LuaUnit::EjectAllVehiclePassengers(lua_State* /*L*/, Unit* ptr)
6670{
6671#ifdef FT_VEHICLES
6672 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6673 {
6674 return 0;
6675 }
6676
6677 const Unit* u = ptr->getVehicleBase();
6678 if (u == nullptr)
6679 return 0;
6680
6681 u->getVehicle()->removeAllPassengers();
6682#endif
6683 return 0;
6684}
6685
6686int LuaUnit::EjectVehiclePassengerFromSeat(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6687{
6688#ifdef FT_VEHICLES
6689 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6690 {
6691 return 0;
6692 }
6693
6694 const Unit* u = ptr->getVehicleBase();
6695 if (u == nullptr)
6696 return 0;
6697
6698 if (u->getVehicle() == nullptr)
6699 return 0;
6700
6701 if (lua_gettop(L) != 1)
6702 return 0;
6703
6704 const int8_t seat = static_cast<int8_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
6705
6706 if (Unit* passenger = u->getVehicle()->getPassenger(seat))
6707 passenger->callExitVehicle();
6708#endif
6709 return 0;
6710}
6711
6712int LuaUnit::MoveVehiclePassengerToSeat(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6713{
6714#ifdef FT_VEHICLES
6715 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6716 {
6717 return 0;
6718 }
6719
6720 const Unit* u = ptr->getVehicleBase();
6721 if (u == nullptr)
6722 return 0;
6723
6724 if (lua_gettop(L) != 2)
6725 return 0;
6726
6727 Unit* passenger = CHECK_UNIT(L, 1);
6728 const uint32_t seat = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
6729
6730 if (passenger == nullptr)
6731 return 0;
6732
6733 passenger->callChangeSeat(seat);
6734#endif
6735 return 0;
6736}

6749
6750int LuaUnit::GetWorldStateForZone(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6751{
6752 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6753 {
6754 return 0;
6755 }
6756
6757 if (lua_gettop(L) != 1)
6758 return 0;
6759
6760 const uint32_t field = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
6761 uint32_t zoneId;
6762 uint32_t areaId;
6763 uint32_t entry = 0;
6764
6765 ptr->getWorldMap()->getZoneAndAreaId(ptr->GetPhase(), zoneId, areaId, ptr->GetPosition());
6766
6767 if (zoneId == 0)
6768 entry = areaId;
6769 else
6770 entry = zoneId;
6771
6772 if (entry == 0)
6773 return 0;
6774
6775 const uint32_t value = ptr->getWorldMap()->getWorldStatesHandler().GetWorldStateForZone(entry, 0, field);
6776
6777 lua_pushinteger(L, value);
6778 return 1;
6779}
6780
6781int LuaUnit::SetWorldStateForZone(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6782{
6783 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6784 {
6785 return 0;
6786 }
6787
6788 if (lua_gettop(L) != 2)
6789 return 0;
6790
6791 const uint32_t field = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
6792 const uint32_t value = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
6793
6794 uint32_t zoneId;
6795 uint32_t areaId;
6796 uint32_t entry = 0;
6797
6798 ptr->getWorldMap()->getZoneAndAreaId(ptr->GetPhase(), zoneId, areaId, ptr->GetPosition());
6799
6800 if (zoneId == 0)
6801 entry = areaId;
6802 else
6803 entry = zoneId;
6804
6805 if (entry == 0)
6806 return 0;
6807
6808 ptr->getWorldMap()->getWorldStatesHandler().SetWorldStateForZone(entry, 0, field, value);
6809 return 0;
6810}
6811
6812int LuaUnit::SetWorldStateForPlayer(lua_State* L, Unit* ptr)
6813{
6814 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
6815 {
6816 return 0;
6817 }
6818
6819 if (lua_gettop(L) != 2)
6820 return 0;
6821
6822 const uint32_t field = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
6823 const uint32_t value = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
6824
6825 dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->sendWorldStateUpdate(field, value);
6826 return 0;
6827}
